Upside's Instance Picker

Saturday 02 Sep 05:51:44 AM GMT

This is a list of Mastodon instances with descriptions and contact information. It also contains preview links, so that you can better decide which instance to join.

Please note that some instances may contain offensive content!

For help and complaints contact: @upside@octodon.social

m4570.xyz

Oxynux

@Oxynux

More Info...

m4570.xyz is an open Mastodon instance, m4570 is for masto(-don) in 1337 5p34k .
It will federate with other instances.
Everyone is welcome to this public and open instance.

Before sign up please read:

Terms of service / Terms of use / Legal Terms or whatever complicated law vocabulary used to designate this.
Read also About this Mastodon instance .

Email: oxynux@m4570.xyz

Admin: @Oxynux@m4570.xyz

masto.quad.moe

about

preview

Mastodon

Users: 7 . Toots: 3132 . Connections: 673 . Language: English

masto.quad.moe

More Info...

Invite-only instance for me and some friends.

Even if a sign up form is visible, don't bother. You won't be able to confirm your mail address

We do not allow:

  • Continued, intentional and targeted bullying
  • Pornographic avatars (No I won't complain about half-naked anime girls)
  • NSFW content that's not tagged as NSFW
  • Repeated spoiling of movies, games, books, etc. Use the content warning
  • Obviously nothing that's actually illegal. Like child pornography or unironic bomb threats

We do allow:

  • Controversial opinions
  • Shitposting (But please stop spamming people if they ask)
  • almost everything else tbh, just don't be an asshole

Server load

5m averages:

1h averages:

Email: contact@quad.moe

Admin: @quad@masto.quad.moe

mastodon.qowala.org

about

preview

Qowala's Mastodon

Users: 5 . Toots: 361 . Connections: 635 . Language: English

Welcome to Qowala's Mastodon instance!
Here, we love open source and we study and work on social networks so naturally we also host a Mastodon instance.
Friendly people are welcome, but as this is a small server, there are limited available slots. So, choose wisely to join or not.

More Info...

showoffto.us

about

preview

join

showoffto.us

Users: 40 . Toots: 45 . Connections: 94 . Language: English

showoffto.us is a NSFW/18+ website for all the exhibitionists and voyeurs out there in the fediverse to, well, let it all out! Come see and be seen!

More Info...

Amateur porn is some of the hottest out there. There's just something about seeing the sexual pictures of other users like yourself without all of that over-the-top porn production.

showoffto.us is not specific to kinks, just amateur content.

Rules

Right now, rules are slim. There are the obvious:

  • ABSOLUTELY NO ONE UNDER THE AGE OF 18! There is an absolute, zero tolerance policy for any sexual content depicting minors.
  • Post content you have the rights/permission to post. Ideally, the pictures are of you, but you may post pictures of friends and significant others with their permission only.
  • Flag NSFW content as such. At least, until there is a large enough community to support us not being federated.

If you see any content that you're not sure belongs here, do not hesitate to report it. Admins reserve the rights to remove any content

Verification

Currently, I am keeping a simple HTML file uploaded ( view here ) with the names of the users that have been verified. How do you verify? The rules can be found here .

Admins

Here is the list of current admins:

  • zetojune (owner)

Email: zetojune@gmail.com

Admin: @zetojune@showoffto.us

creativity.cafe

about

preview

creativity.cafe

Users: 91 . Toots: 3128 . Connections: 791 . Language: English

creativity.cafe is a Mastodon instance for people who make things - artists of any kind, including visual, musical, glitch, 3d, net art, writing, sculpture, and more. Even people who don't create but are just really enthusiastic about creating are welcome! Come on down to talk shop and be around fellow creators.

This is an invite only instance, in order to make sure that people who are here truly want to be here (and to keep my server costs low). If you want an invite , send your email and desired username directly to @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com .

More Info...

Da Rules

  • Be kind to each other
  • Flag looping/flashing GIFs as NSFW for people with epilepsy/nausea/etc.
  • Also flag actually NSFW content as NSFW
  • This is an arts-focused instance. If you post work that isn't yours, try to find and include the source so we can find more of it :)
  • Harassment, slurs, hate speech, etc. explicitly unwelcome

Not a rule, but when you join feel free to introduce yourself with a post and the #introduction / #introductions tags! It's a great way to get found on the network, meet new people, and greet the community.

If you have any issues, reports, complaints, bug notes, or requests, you may contact the administrator, Way, via Mastodon at @way or email wayspurrchen@gmail.com .

Supporting creativity.cafe

Like human beings require touch to survive at a young age, instances require money. If you enjoy this instance, you can throw me a dollar or so to my Patreon to make sure it grows up to be strong and healthy.

Email: wayspurrchen@gmail.com

Admin: @way@creativity.cafe

Mastodon - Parti Pirate

Users: 816 . Toots: 13847 . Connections: 1288 . Language: English

mastodon.partipirate.org est une instance de mastodon gÃ©rÃ©e par le Parti Pirate FranÃ§ais.
mastodon.partipirate.org is a mastodon instance handled by the Parti Pirate (French Pirate Party).

More Info...
TolÃ©rance
Nous, Pirates, assumons notre espoir d'une sociÃ©tÃ© de bienveillance, de tolÃ©rance et de coopÃ©ration. Nous reconnaissons le droit des peuples Ã  disposer d'eux-mÃªmes et l'Ã©gale dignitÃ© de tous les Ãªtres humains. Le texte ci-dessus, intitulÃ© "TolÃ©rance", est issu de la DPG du Parti Pirate .
De fait, quand bien mÃªme le Parti Pirate est pour la libertÃ© d'expression, les points ci-dessus ne seront pas considÃ©rÃ©s comme telle, et la modÃ©ration se fera sentir. L'instance gÃ©rÃ©e par le Parti Pirate ne tolÃ©rera donc aucun harcÃ¨lement, aucune discrimination, aucune agression.

Nyro ÏŸ - MickaÃ«l

@Nyroldiin

This instance is hosted on a dedicated server, in France.

z411(diså¢

@z411

More Info... Omaera MSTDN is a personal Mastodon instance for myself but I open registration in special situations.

This is an instance that values free speech. As long as you don't post anything illegal (under US law) or post spam you won't be banned.

Topics

Technology, Music, Independent Art/Movies, Anime, Drugs, Cryptography/Security, Leftist (anti-liberal) politics

torontomusic.cloud

about

preview

join

Toronto Music - Mastodon

Users: 71 . Toots: 478 . Connections: 510 . Language: English

Contact:

N/A

Not set

N/A

More Info...

A social network for Toronto music folks: artists, bands, presenters, independent media, concertgoers, collaborators, DJs, producers, music sharers, venues, indie record labels, and whoever else wants to join. There are no ads, and no algorithms. All your followers will see your posts here, and you won't miss any posts by your favourite people.

Mastodon is a new open-source Twitter alternative that's beginning to get popular in Japan and France. It's a bit basic compared with established social networks, but it's brand-new. There's a community of volunteer developers working on it and it's getting better every day.

For now, torontomusic.cloud will use the policies of the main English-language Mastodon network, mastodon.social. In the future these will be determined by the users of torontomusic.cloud, but many of them seem unlikely to change.

  • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
  • The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive promotion (promotion is great and encouraged! we're talking about extreme, spammy promotion here)
      2. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      3. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    2. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    social.etc-services.de

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon social.etc-services.de

    Users: 61 . Toots: 188 . Connections: 505 . Language: English

    It's an open Mastodon instance, feel free to join us ;)

    More Info...

    Blocked servers

    There are no blocked servers atm.


    Rules

    The following guidelines, mostly adopted from mastodon.social, are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.etc-services.de. They are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive advertising
      2. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      3. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

      5. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.


    Email: social@duke.de

    Admin: @duke@social.etc-services.de

    Deviant ğŸ¤˜

    @deviant

    We create decentralised community networks for sharing & freecycling. Join our community if you are (also) interested in connecting with others that share this vision.

    social.nasqueron.org

    about

    preview

    join

    Social Nasqueron

    Users: 924 . Toots: 8723 . Connections: 1113 . Language: English

    Nasqueron is a budding community of creative people, writers, developers and thinkers. We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    More Info...

    You'll find here like-minded people to connect to, hang out, and build projects.

    We focus on free culture, ethics and to be a positive change. When we develop a project, our software is open source our datasources and content are licensed under CC-BY-SA or CC-BY license. We share values like respect, justice and equity.

    We like experiments, originality and to discover new things.

    We are Nasqueron.

    More information

    Email: dereckson@social.nasqueron

    Admin: @Dereckson@social.nasqueron.org

    This is â€“ currently an unofficial â€“ place for the DiEM25 community to have open conversations. The hope is that it will bring greater transparency to our internal communications and allow greater interaction between members, the advisory panel, and the coordinating committee. Currently maintained by DiEM25 Advisory Panel member Aral Balkan as part of the 7th pillar Internet of People initiative.

    Admin: Not Available

    mementomori.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Mementomori.space

    Users: 5 . Toots: 68 . Connections: 291 . Language: English

    Contact:

    N/A

    Not set

    N/A

    Memento Mori is directly translated from latin to, "remember death."

    People have been creating reminders of death for as long as humans have been aware of dying.

    Oftentimes In our contemporary culture, talking about death and dying is considered to be morbid and unwanted. However, an appreciation of life can also be gained from these reminders of mortality, and also allow us to cope with death, as it is ultimately unavoidable.

    Memento Mori

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    arukas.me

    about

    preview

    join

    Arukas

    Users: 9 . Toots: 155 . Connections: 50 . Language: English

    Contact:

    N/A

    ãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹

    @ress

    This Mastodon instance is for people interested in technology. Discussions aren't limited to technology, because tech folks shouldn't be limited to technology either!

    Don't be a jerk to anyone or we'll need to be a jerk to you. We adhere to the TootCat Code of Conduct and follow the Toot CafÃ© list of blocked instances .

    lgbt.io

    about

    preview

    join

    LGBT.io

    Users: 274 . Toots: 14193 . Connections: 760 . Language: English

    By signing up, you agree to abide by the Terms and the Rules for this instance including, but not limited to, the following:-

    1. Do not discriminate, harrass and/or insult members based on their religion, race, gender, sexuality and political beliefs.
    2. Do not bully and/or pick on other members.
    3. Do not flame other members.
    4. Do not advertise. As of now, you are not permitted to make money using lgbt.io.
    5. Do not publicly expose your real identity unless you're using "Direct" privacy and you're communicating with someone you can trust.
    6. Do not post screenshots or history of toot conversations publicly without all participants' consent.
    7. Do not post copyrighted, piracy, warez and leaked content.
    8. Do not spam.
    9. All NSFW/sexual content must be accompanied by NSFW (not safe for work) and/or CW (content warning) option when writing a toot.
    10. ..more rules will be added when needed.

    Note: Make sure to report any toots that violate the rules. A staff member will evaluate the reported toots and take appropriate actions against the them.

    Happy tooting! :)

    Our Supporter List

    - @codeawayhaley
    - Anonymous 1
    - Jeremy S.


    You can support us on Patreon or https://PayPal.Me/IfYouLikeWhatIDo

    More Info...
    Contact
    ğŸ‘­â¤ @self
    Contact Us: admin@lgbt.io

    Email: admin@lgbt.io

    Admin: @self@lgbt.io

    ãƒ»å€‹äººé‹å–¶ã®ãŸã‚ã€æ€¥ã«çµ‚äº†ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™

    theferret.social

    about

    preview

    join

    The Ferret Social

    Users: 6 . Toots: 25 . Connections: 293 . Language: English

    Contact:

    contact@theferret.scot

    Not set

    N/A

    More Info...

    This Mastodon instance is hosted by a media co-operative based in Scotland, called The Ferret.

    This means that all the people posting on it, can also own and help fund it.

    If you want an account here, then you should be a paying member of The Ferret.

    This is something of an experiment - but we want it to be sustainable. Should costs of supporting it become too great, we may remove any accounts that have been set up with an email address that is not linked to a paying member of The Ferret.

    Email: contact@theferret.scot

    Admin: Not Available

    scotland.computer

    about

    preview

    join

    Scottish Tech Mastodon

    Users: 32 . Toots: 115 . Connections: 179 . Language: English

    An instance of the Mastodon social network for the tech/startup scene in Scotland.

    The goal is to gather all the web/tech people in one place to make for an interesting local timeline.

    You don't need to actually be Scottish or in Scotland! Friends, the curious, and all of good will are welcome!

    More Info...

    This is an open instance of the Mastodon social network, aimed at gathering the Scottish web/tech/startup scene in one local timeline.

    You don't need to be Scottish or in Scotland to be welcome here! If you're interested in the tech scene, or friends with people here, you're more than welcome!

    Code of Conduct

    This will be fleshed out in more detail at a later date, but the summary is:

    • Show respect for people's personal space. If they don't want you in their mentions, leave.
    • Do not use this platform to harass, stalk, troll, spam, or otherwise be a dick.
    • No nazis.

    If you are experiencing harassment or spamming, please report the offending account and I'll investigate. If you feel at risk or otherwise want to contact the admin directly, I can be reached at john@scotland.computer.

    The mgmt reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason, except as prohibited by law.

    Email: john@scotland.computer

    Admin: @semanticist@scotland.computer

    toot.berlin

    about

    preview

    join

    toot.BERLIN

    Users: 508 . Toots: 5335 . Connections: 1106 . Language: English

    The Mastodon instance for Berlin. Mastodon is a free, decentralised microblogging platform (think Twitter, but free).
    Provided by the devops nerds at Planio .
    Impressum Â· DatenschutzerklÃ¤rung

    More Info...
    This instance is humming nicely on a 6 core, 16 GB RAM KVM VM on a 12 core, 128 GB RAM bare metal hardware node with dual SSDs in a RAID1, hosted at Hetzner in Germany with multiple redundant uplinks on 100% renewable energy sources. We perform offsite backups daily and upgrade to the latest Mastodon version frequently.
    TL;DR We know what we are doing and your data should be safe. However, since this is a free service, we do not guarantee it.
    Code of conduct: We value free speech as long as it's not harming anybody. Just don't be a jerk .

    Email: jan@toot.berlin

    Admin: @jan@toot.berlin

    mastodon.land

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 1301 . Toots: 11143 . Connections: 1028 . Language: English

    Free Mastodon instance open to all users.
    Create an account here give you an opportunity to interact with mastodon users across all other instances.

    More Info...

    Description

    We believe in free softwares and we plan to maintain our instance on the long term.

    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.

    Any user not respecting these rules may get suspended.

    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.

    • Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited
    • Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

    Servers location : France

    Stats

    Mastodon

    SystÃ¨me

    Email: contact@rock-hosting

    Admin: @Yann@mastodon.land

    å¯æ„›ã„2Dã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã¨ã‚·ãƒ³ãƒ—ãƒ«ãªæ“ä½œã§ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆPCã§ã‚‚ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤ã§ãã‚‹ã‚ªãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã€‚ç°¡å˜ãªç™»éŒ²ã§èª°ã§ã‚‚æ°—è»½ã«å§‹ã‚ã‚‰ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚æ–°è¦ãƒ—ãƒ¬ã‚¤2é€±é–“ç„¡æ–™ã€‚

    Micro-blogging site operated by Mark Shane Hayden of Coalesco Digital Systems Inc. We are located in Alberta, Canada. This is NOT intended to be a commercial/promotional site!     Users: 588 . Toots: 12137 . Connections: 824 . Language: English

    PLEASE NOTE: There is no way yet to delete accounts or change usernames. So please bear that in mind before creating an account.

    Just another Mastodon instance. But we like it here. Bad behavior is not rewarded. If your hobbies involve harassing people, the constant use of 'SJW' or 'cuck' as pejoratives, or just general shitposting, then find somewhere else to go. You own your freedom. I own the server. A longer, more-detailed policy for this instance is in the works.

    Tusk.social uses the Witches.Town domain block list .

    Don't harass. Don't be a shitty person. Do that, and we'll get along just fine.

    PS - Yo, please get an icon straight away so you don't look like a bot. Also, local accounts which haven't tooted after 45 days are subject to deletion/suspension. Also also, while it's not a rule, just a request... please don't use this instance for follow bots and the like. If it takes, rather than contributes, please do that somewhere else.

    Extended About Page

    More Info...

    FYI - hotmail.com, outlook.com and live.com (so... all of Microsoft, basically) don't like our mail host (mailgun). So... you might have problems if your email is with one of those. Sorry.

    "What's this Mastodon thing all about??" - Here are a couple of articles to get you started.

    http://www.theverge.com/2017/4/7/15183128/mastodon-open-source-twitter-clone-how-to-use
    https://medium.com/@qinaliu/what-i-wish-i-knew-before-joining-mastodon-7a17e7f12a2b

    Email: accounts@tusk.social

    Admin: @tankgrrl@tusk.social

    Use \( and \) for inline LaTeX, and \[ and \] for display mode.

    kinky.business

    about

    preview

    join

    Kinky Business

    Users: 299 . Toots: 9429 . Connections: 691 . Language: English

    kinky.business is a Mastodon instance for the kink community. All you naughty people are in the right place. Sign up and let's go :)

    More Info...

    I'm @bedtimedrillsgt , a 30-something Dom. Beard and boobs enthusiast.

    I built this Mastodon instance because there's plenty of room for fun sub-communities in the fediverse. And so, here is a home for all you kinky, filthy fucks.

    Discuss your hopes and desires, post your latest toys or bruises and most of all, have fun.

    If you have any questions or concerns, toot at me

    Rules

    • Keep everything here safe, sane, and consensual . No exceptions.
    • Do not flood the server with posts
    • Use NSFW/CW tags for NSFW media
    • Respect each other, absolutely no hate speech
    • Zero tolerance for underage or otherwise illegal content

    Feel free to report users or content that should not be here.

    Admins of this site reserve the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    A note on federation

    This is a regularly federated instance. Keep in mind that CW/NSFW tags are necessary not to get blocked by other servers.

    Be thoughtful of the people who might be reading / seeing your content on their federated timelines.

    Email: admin@kinky.business

    Admin: @bedtimedrillsgt@kinky.business

    è¬è¾

    ãƒˆãƒƒãƒ—ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã®ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ @kotobacchi ã•ã‚“ã«æã„ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã¾ã—ãŸã€ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ï¼

    ä»¥ä¸‹ã®æ–¹ã€…ã®ãŠã‹ã’ã§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã‚’ç¶­æŒã§ãã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ï¼ï¼ˆEntyã«åå‰ã‚’è¨­å®šã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹ã¨ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã«æ²è¼‰ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã§ãã‚Œã°ãã®éš› @palon ã«ã”ä¸€å ±ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹ã¨ã‚ã‚ŠãŒãŸã„ã§ã™...!ï¼‰

    mastodon.partecipa.digital

    about

    preview

    join

    A tech savvy Mastodon

    Users: 38 . Toots: 1080 . Connections: 630 . Language: English

    Just another Pachyderm trying to fly like a bird.
    Feel free to sign up if you'd like to join conversations about IT, Open Source, Linux, various and miscellaneous.
    Mastodon instance supported by Omnis Systems Ltd a fine purveyor of Open Source and Linux based solutions to modern & dynamic organisations.

    Things may break while we are testing and/or updating this Mastodon instance.
    People will be kicked out from this instance if they misbehave.
    If you feel that any post may have hurt your feeling then stop reading it.
    If posts can/are considered indecent, inappropriate and/or illegal in UK or EU please do report them and actions will be taken ASAP.
    Users with abusive behaviour/content will be blocked without notice.

    Email: paolo@partecipa.digital

    Admin: @paolo@mastodon.partecipa.digital

    tootplanet.space

    about

    preview

    join

    Toot Planet

    Users: 61 . Toots: 27212 . Connections: 799 . Language: English

    Contact:

    admin@tootplanet.space

    Inspector Caracal

    @InspectorCaracal

    More Info... UNDER CONSTRUCTION
    Our front page is a bit of a mess right now from the v1.5 update, but it'll be cleaned up and looking great soon!
    Help keep Toot Planet running! https://www.patreon.com/tootplanet
    We're a (lightly?) moderated community; harassment is not tolerated, and doing nothing but self-promotion or advertising is frowned on.
    Other than that, we welcome anyone who wants to come join and whatever language you speak! Anyone who creates - writing, drawing, game devs, crafting, you name it - is especially welcome, since we all do that kind of thing already. By a similar token, we are also a queer- and kink-friendly planet.
    Special thanks to @Daily@tootplanet.space for doing the Tooting Planet art, and to @catterfly@tootplanet.space for letting me make a background out of their awesome planet art.

    Email: admin@tootplanet.space

    Admin: @InspectorCaracal@tootplanet.space

    mastodon.sandwich.net

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon Sandwich

    Users: 340 . Toots: 1324 . Connections: 653 . Language: English

    Contact:

    support@sandwich.net

    James Renken

    @jrenken

    More Info... This is Sandwich 's public Mastodon instance. Welcome! Moderation is at our discretion - please see below.
    We recommend that you read the #MastodonSandwich hashtag and @sungo's toot about Mastodon's risks . Feel free to chat with us about risk, privacy, security, and other questions.
    We support free and controversial speech, but also wish to maintain a pleasant environment. We forbid trolling, harassment, bigotry, and spam. Please use the Content Warning feature for NSFW or traumatic topics. When handling problems, we try to consider all of the circumstances, and to be reasonable and understanding.
    We will not sell your data, and will make every reasonable attempt to combat coerced disclosure of your data or our logs.

    Email: support@sandwich.net

    Admin: @jrenken@mastodon.sandwich.net

    masto.io

    about

    preview

    join

    Masto.io

    Users: 550 . Toots: 5045 . Connections: 1103 . Language: English

    Small alternative Mastodon instance with a short name. Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    More Info...

    Contacts

    Fell free to contact me (through @sena@masto.io or sena@smux.net ) for any instance related issue.

    Rules

    Here are the house rules :

    • No harassing other people;
    • No posting NSFW content or spoilers without using the Content Warning feature;
    • No posting illegal content which can get you or me in trouble (this content will be removed if necessary, you may or may not be banned);
    • Parody accounts are permitted (and encouraged!), but it's suggested (not required) that such is stated in the bio.

    Just be a good human being â„¢.

    Location and jurisdiction

    Currently, the infrastructure which supports this instance is hosted in the United States (Kansas City, Missouri), although there are medium term plans to migrate it to some European location.

    I am not based on the United States, so I may be more or less free from harassment from US law enforcement. Keep in mind that they should be able to shut the instance down and eavesdrop on communications and data without even warning me.

    Federation

    For transparency reasons,here's a list of instances we don't federate with:

    • we currently don't block any instance

    Donations

    If you want to help with hosting costs, feel free to donate through:

    • Bitcoin: 1ESdVqpycpQoXjdzjnW7Q9GpVr2ehT9mCy ;
    • PayPal: paypal.me/jsribeiro .

    Email: sena@smux.net

    Admin: @sena@masto.io

    Users: 178 . Toots: 1127 . Connections: 774 . Language: English

    A Minecraft-focused Mastodon instance run by SurgePlay. You're free to talk about anything else, as long as it's not overly offensive or obnoxious. Please put a warning on any content that others may not want to see. TL;DR: Have fun and don't be a jerk!
    Please support us on Patreon if you like the site! â†’ https://patreon.com/unascribed

    Hosted in New Jersey in the United States.
    We reserve the right to remove any content at any time for any reason.
    We use Twemoji instead of EmojiOne, as a matter of preference.

    mastodon.my

    about

    preview

    join

    MyMastodon

    Users: 24 . Toots: 94 . Connections: 659 . Language: English

    A Mastadon instance launched for fellow Malaysians and everyone on the internet who likes being with us!

    More Info... This is a Mastodon instance run by @s.

    This Mastodon instance is created for fellow Malaysians (hence on .my domain extension). However, it is also open for everyone on the internet who likes being with us! ;-)

    Rules and Regulations:

    1) Never share your login credentials with anyone else and never save your login credentials on public or someone else's computer/phone/tablet browser.

    2) Do not post any copyrighted material unless the copyright is owned by you or by this website.

    3) Do not post any material which is knowingly false and/or defamatory, inaccurate, abusive, vulgar, hateful, harassing, obscene, profane, threatening, invasive of a person's privacy, or otherwise violative of any law.

    4) Homophobic, misogynistic and racist posts are strictly not allowed, you will be permanently banned right away.

    5) NSFW (Not Safe for Work) and/or CW (Content Warning) options must be enabled for adults content such as sexually explicit images.

    6) Members are encouraged to use the report tool when you see inappropriate content such as adults content without NSFW/CW.

    This server is currently funded by myself. If you want to help me out, feel free to visit https://patreon.com/MyMastodon

    As a reward, your Mastodon username will be mentioned in our donator list on our website. Thank you! :-)

    Email: admin@mastodon.my

    Admin: @admin@mastodon.my

    é›‘è«‡ã—ã¦ã‚‹æ‰€ã«æ··ã–ã‚‹ã®ã‚‚ã„ã„ã§ã™ã—ã€ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã®è³ªå•ã‚„ãƒã‚¿ã‚’æŠ•ã’ã‚Œã°é«˜ç¢ºç‡ã§èª°ã‹ãŒåå¿œã—ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚ã‚Šã¨ã¿ã‚“ãªè­°è«–ã—ãŸã‚Šã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒã‚¤ã‚¹ã—ãŸã‚ŠãŒå¥½ããªã®ã§ã€æ˜¯éæ˜¯éä½•ã‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã—ã¦ã¿ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    More Info...
    I'm Andrew, from Of Many Trades and Analog Revolution. This is my mastodon instance. Registration opens periodically, and is always available for Patreon backers. < br />< br /> This is my Mastodon instance. It's mostly for my friends and collaborators. It's also for anyone with an explainable fascination with forgotten futures. < br />< br /> We don't tolerate abuse. We will not be complicit in the spread of hatred. Beyond that, have fun!

    Email: me@andrewroach.net

    Admin: Not Available

    bapp.me

    about

    preview

    bapp.me

    Users: 127 . Toots: 201 . Connections: 477 . Language: English

    Welcome! Feel free to make an account and use this instance. I promise to keep it running if any users show up, at most I will close registration in the unlikely event that it gets too big for me to financially support.

    More Info...

    Registration is open unless it becomes a problem.

    Running on a 2CPU/2GB RAM droplet for now, will increase it if necessary (probably not past 50â‚¬/month or so but I might consider cheap colo hosting instead if it comes to that).

    Rules:
    • No content promoting racism, sexism, xenophobia, homophobia or nazis allowed (and if your content skirts these categories then think twice before posting).
    • I prefer restorative justice where possible but offending content will be removed, and continued toxicity results in a ban.
    Still pretty new to this whole thing and I set everything up manually instead of using a docker image as a learning experience so some things might be broken.

    Email: atbaaba@gmail.com

    Admin: @anttirt@bapp.me

    @me

    More Info...
    Another dank Mastodon instance. Just be cool and nice and play well. For awesome people only. I'm just sitting here and watch if anyone is doing bad stuff. We also accept other non-German-speaking people.
    Oh, please donate a little, so I can keep this instance alive and don't need to pay this thing on my own. With your support this instance will be ad-free and without tracker-bullshit.
    Monthly donation goal : We got it here

    forum.manga.tokyo

    about

    preview

    join

    Forum.MANGA.TOKYO

    Users: 699 . Toots: 6359 . Connections: 330 . Language: English

    Contact:

    manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    MANGA.TOKYO

    @mangatokyo

    More Info...

    A community for fans of Japanese culture, such as anime, manga, voice actors and more, operated by MANGA.TOKYO through a mastodon instance. Anybody can participate in talks about the hottest topics and the newest anime information as well as find new friends and talk to people who have the same interests.

    How to make an account

    To use forum.manga.tokyo you must create an account.

    1. Fill in your username, e-mail address and password and click â€˜Get Startedâ€™.

    2. You will receive a confirmation e-mail, please confirm your account by clicking on the link in the e-mail.

    3. Log in via the Login page.

    That completes your registration.
    Let's have fun!!

    Forum Rules

    Use hashtags when talking about specific anime/manga etc
    Use the spoiler tag â€˜CWâ€™ for spoilers
    Respect others to create a place that everybody likes to return to.

    Note

    • Acts against the law are prohibited.
    • Do not infringe on the rights of others.
    • Do not copy or post the work of others without permission.
    • Do not act against public order or morals.
    • Do not impersonate other people or imitate organizations etc.
    • Do not cause hurt or loss in any form to other people
    • Do not overload the server with material

    â€» Please note that anything you write in your toots (posts) here may be quoted on MANGA.TOKYO

    Contact and Inquiries

    Twitter: @manga_tokyo_

    If you find we have infringed upon copyright, please contact us on the following address

    Mail: info.manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Terms of Use

    Privacy Policy

    Email: manga.tokyo@donika.co.jp

    Admin: @mangatokyo@forum.manga.tokyo

    Mastodon

    Users: 10 . Toots: 38 . Connections: 62 . Language: FranÃ§ais

    Une instance francophone ouverte aux fans de poneys !
    N'oubliez pas de lire nos rÃ¨gles sur la page des dÃ©tails .

    More Info...

    Bienvenue, ceci est l'instance Mastodon installÃ©e et maintenue par Pony France.

    Envie d'en savoir plus sur Mastodon ? Alda a Ã©crit un trÃ¨s bon article, en franÃ§ais, sur son blog : "Welcome to Mastodon" .
    Une FAQ en anglais est disponible sur mastoguide.info .


    Cette instance et alternatives

    Ici, vous pourrez obtenir un compte au format "@PSEUDO@ponyfrance.net". Vous pouvez rejoindre n'importe quel instance ouverte et suivre les utilisateurs des autres sites. Une liste est disponible ici .


    On vous propose aussi d'autres instances francophone :

    • equestria.social
      Un autre rÃ©seau pour les fans de poneys.
    • witches.town
      Un endroit accueillant pour les personnes queers, fÃ©ministes, anarchistes et compagnie ainsi qu'Ã  leur sympathisantâ‹…eâ‹…s.

    RÃ¨gles de base

    Il va bien falloir instaurer quelques rÃ¨gles pour s'assurer que tout le monde puisse s'entendre. Sachez que l'expression qui va bien est Don't be a d*ck .
    En cas de problÃ¨mes, signalez les messages et comptes avec la fonction "Signaler..." dans le menu du message.

    1. Restez civil, respectez les autres personnes et leurs choix
    2. Evitez le flood et le spam
    3. Utilisez la fonction NSFW et les spoilers (bouton CW) si nÃ©cessaire, dans la limite des rá»gles
    4. Il n'est pas permi de poster...
      • De la pornographie, y compris en dessin (la nuditÃ©e est permise, mais NSFW + CW)
      • Du contenu gore, vore, homophobe et xÃ©nophobe
      • Ce qui n'est pas lÃ©gal en France (oui, les lolis aussi)

    Concernants les comptes permis sur cette instance...

    1. Le comptes liÃ©s a des entitÃ©es Ã  but lucratif ne sont pas autorisÃ©s
    2. Les robots sont permis aprÃ¨s demande et acceptation par l'Ã©quipe .
    3. Les comptes parodiques sont autorisÃ©s avec les conditions suivantes :
      • Le nom du compte doit avoir un point d'ironie , ØŸ
      • La description du compte doit faire mention qu'il s'agit d'un compte parodique

    Email: contact@ponyfrance.net

    Admin: @PonyFrance@social.ponyfrance.net

    sdfn-01.ninjawedding.org

    Users: 2 . Toots: 1127 . Connections: 586 . Language: English

    Contact:

    N/A

    ğ©•

    @ninjawedding

    More Info...

    This is a small ship in the fediverse.

    The name is borrowed from the mass-produced Macross-class ships in the Macross universe; SDFN-01 Hayase was the first of the line. The ships were designed to scout emigration routes ahead of the Megaroad colonization ship.

    More information can be found at the Macross Compendium .

    Federation transparency report (2017-08-14)

    • Suspended instances: none
    • Silenced instances: none
    • Instance block policy: none

    Personal.pizza Party

    Users: 30 . Toots: 153 . Connections: 431 . Language: English

    party.personal.pizza is a mastodon instance.

    ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰

    Every pizza is a personal pizza if you try hard and believe in yourself.

    ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰ğŸ•ğŸ‰

    âš ï¸ Please read this instance's extended description ! âš ï¸

    More Info...

    About

    This is a small, experimental instance, currently running on Heroku. If you want guarantees about uptime or stability, you might want to choose a bigger one from the list here .

    The Rules

    Only three:

    1. Please follow the WeAllJS code of conduct .
    2. Your benevolent instance admin reserves the right to hellban anyone whenever.
    3. Likes are florps and timeline goes sideways

    Email: e@cmendenhall.com

    Admin: @ecmendenhall@party.personal.pizza

    todon.nl

    about

    preview

    join

    Todon.nl

    Users: 173 . Toots: 10238 . Connections: 753 . Language: English

    Contact:

    admin@todon.nl

    Admin Todon.nl

    @admin

    More Info...

    Todon.nl is a Mastodon instance for progressive people. Although we are located in the Netherlands, we like to welcome every progressive person from all over the world.
    So if you are (for example) a leftist, socialist, anarchist, Marxist, ecologist, green, vegan, open-minded, anti-racist, pirate, social democrat or social liberal, please join us!


    Todon.nl is een Mastodon -server voor progressieve mensen. Ondanks dat wij ons in Nederland bevinden, willen wij elk progressief persoon van over de hele wereld welkom heten.
    Dus ben je (bijvoorbeeld) links, socialist, anarchist, ecologisch, groen, vegan, ruimdenkend, antiracist, piraat, sociaaldemocraat of sociaalliberaal, meld je dan aan!


    Email: admin@todon.nl

    Admin: @admin@todon.nl

    mastodon.host

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.host

    Users: 3493 . Toots: 30924 . Connections: 2095 . Language: English

    Contact:

    gled@remote-shell.net

    gled

    @gled

    More Info...

  • General, fast, stable and open instance.


  • Federate with everyone.


  • One of the most complete Federated timeline thanks to @federationbot

  • lightly moderated in general, common sense applied. That said, read the rules below :)


    • What sets mastodon.host appart ?

    As a general instance, we are not centered on a specific theme, or a specific language. Everyone is welcome as long as they follow the few rules we have.
    We always run the latest stable version of mastodon, providing you a stock experience, with the following modifications:
    - 1024 character limit ( not 500 ).
    - 512 character limits for the account's bio ( not 160 ).
    - full column width ( not fixed size ).
    - more search results ( 20 instead of 5 per type of search ).
    - text search of statuses ( not restricted to searching tags and users ).
    - boosts and replies are shown in the timelines ( more complete view for everyone ).
    - Your mastodon.host account is also a XMPP account ( Federated Instant Messaging, take a look online to find a client and use your mastodon.host username and password to configure it ). Woohoo! two services in one!
    We also have a very good view of the federation ( our federated timeline gives you a more broad view of the Mastodon network than a 'normal' instance, there's a lot to read in a lot of languages ).
    Although we are a medium+ sized instance, we'd like to keep the feeling that you are at home and safe here. Never hesitate to contact the admin team if you have any questions !
    Please read the FAQ below or at https://mastodon.host/about/more to get started.

    What are the instance's rules ?

    No illegal stuff, harassment, discrimination, xenophobia, threats or any behavior that is not appropriate to a friend will be tolerated to our users. This is a safe place for everyone, respect your fellow users or silence/block if you don't want to see someone.
    We will step up on our users report but will ban from our instance only problematic situations or when our users can't do it themselves/needs us to protect them. We suggest that you first block the persons you don't want to see. If that situation degenerates, contact us and we'll deal with it. Moderation is a last resort action, as you, the user have the power to block/silence anyone or any instance you want.
    For content posted here now: Erotic/Porn/Gore/Etc.. talks/pictures/videos.. shall be behind a CW. If you would not open that picture/video in front of your boss/spouse/kids => CW ( Content Warning ).
    Anything that is illegal in Europe/USA shall not be posted on this server, Lolicons, for example, are illegal. Globally common sense applied, don't do illegal stuff, don't discriminate, don't be a racist, etc...
    Notify to an administrator or report if you have a doubt. Do not engage, if you don't want to see someone's contributions, you can block/silence that person and report to us, we'll deal with it.
    We try to post in English so everyone understands, but that rule is not enforced at all ;)
    Most importantly have fun and be nice to each other!
    Regarding bots:
    Bots are allowed as long as their main posts are done 'unlisted' ( not displayed on the timelines ). You are allowed to advertise your bot on the timelines a couple times a week. Any bot not respecting those rules will be silenced by default. We just want to prevent having a bot monopolizing the timeline. Thanks for your understanding.

    What is this instance privacy policy ?

    We will never share your data with anyone, except if a valid legal request is received (Hopefully it will not happen).

    Who are the admins? Shoutouts section.

    This instance is hosted/admin by @gled and moderated by @House_of_Pears
    Big thanks to @WeAreAllOne for being the first to donate to support the server costs !
    Thank you Ann for the support and the message :)
    Thank you Nikki for the paypal donation :)

    Email: gled@remote-shell.net

    Admin: @gled@mastodon.host

    Mastodonã®ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰

    Here is an instance of Mastodon founded by "Haru" who lives in Echigo-Tsumari "Tokamachi city, Niigata Prefecture" at the Echigo-tsumari Art Field(Triennial / Festival). People who live in Tokamachi City, people who love Tokamachi City, anyone can use it. Please do not hesitate to toot about local topics etc.

    SolSoCoG

    @SolSoCoG

    More Info... SECURE multiple A+ TLS ratings ( TLS OBS QUA HTB )
    STABLE financially backed, won't go down in a week like some do
    POWERFUL Intel Xeon E5-1650v3, 128GB DDR4-2133 RAM, 4x2TB WD SE HDDs RAID10 (high traffic configs to fit mass amounts of users)
    LIBERAL based in Germany , Frankfurt and uses 1984.is DNS and LE Certs
    IPv6 SUPPORT via tunnelbroker.net
    NO LOGS nginx and mastodon are not saving any logs
    USE VIA TOR NETWORK AT iejidevtqqdlukju.onion for extra anonymity (you have to accept an invalid https certificate though, as Let's Encrypt disallows .onion certification)
    KNOW YOUR HOST german legit Impressum (imprint) with many ways to contact
    FOSS LOVERS we support a variety of open source software with mirror space

    æ³¨æ„äº‹é …

    ã‚„ã£ã¤ã‘ä»•äº‹ã§ç«‹ã¦ãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãªã®ã§ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®æ°¸ç¶šæ€§ã¯ä¿è¨¼ã§ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã‚‚ã—ã‹ã—ãŸã‚‰ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒæ¶ˆãˆãŸã‚Šã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’ä¸­æ–­ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚‚ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒã€ãã‚Œã§ã‚‚ã„ã„ã¨ã„ã†æ–¹ã¯ã”ç™»éŒ²ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    • ç™»éŒ²ã—ãŸã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹å®›ã¦ã«ç¢ºèªç”¨ã®ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šãã¾ã™ã€‚è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«æ‰±ã„ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã«æŒ¯ã‚Šåˆ†ã‘ã‚‰ã‚Œã¦ã„ãªã„ã‹æ°—ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦ã€‚

    ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    • æ³•å¾‹ã«é•åã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã‚„çŠ¯ç½ªè¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚

    • 18ç¦ã«ãªã‚Šãã†ãªæ–‡ç« ã«ã¯ Content Warning ã‚’ã€ç”»åƒã«ã¯ NSFW ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ä»˜ã‘ã¦ã„ã¦ã‚‚æ³•ã«è§¦ã‚Œã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¯ãƒ€ãƒ¡ã€‚
    • åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«éŸ³æ¥½ã®è©±ã§ç››ã‚Šä¸ŠãŒã‚Šã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†ã€‚
    • ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«é•åè¡Œç‚ºã‚’ç™ºè¦‹ã—ãŸå ´åˆã€äºˆå‘Šãªãã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å‡çµã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›å…ˆ

    ãŠå•ã„åˆã‚ã›ã¯ã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ« (musicdn.info(at)gmail.com) ã‚‚ã—ãã¯ mastodon (@8b) ã«ãŠé¡˜ã„ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    mastodonãŒè½ã¡ãŸæ™‚ãªã©ã®é‡è¦é€£çµ¡ã¯ã€ twitter ( @musicdnJP ) ã§ãŠçŸ¥ã‚‰ã›ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ„ã‚¤ãƒƒã‚¿ãƒ¼é ¼ã¿ã€‚ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼æ¨å¥¨ã§ã™ã€‚

    mastodon.acc.sunet.se

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon @ SUNET

    Users: 26 . Toots: 57 . Connections: 353 . Language: English

    mastodon.acc.sunet.se is run by the Academic Computer Club at UmeÃ¥ University located in UmeÃ¥, Sweden. ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks. You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website .

    Registration is open to the public, but we ask you read over and comply with our terms of use.

    More Info...

    WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

    Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.

    General Usage

    Accounts on mastodon.acc.sunet.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own ? :)

    We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):
    ( in English ) ( i Svenska )

    You may not post (or boost/repost):

    • material illegal under Swedish laws
    • material against the rules of SUNET
    • material in breach of the copyright act
    • material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

    It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

    Code of Conduct

    Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

    You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

    Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette ). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

    If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

    Reporting an issue

    For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

    For content or abuse issues:

    • if you're a user on mastodon.acc.sunet.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
    • If you're not a user on mastodon.acc.sunet.se, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".

    For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

    Privacy

    ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

    Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

    Federation

    mastodon.acc.sunet.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

    Currently not federating with: none

    In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

    Currently silenced:

    • pawoo.net (no media)

    Last updated: 2017-05-15

    Email: mastodon@acc.umu

    Admin: @maswan@mastodon.acc.sunet.se

    Rules :

    â€¢ Don't flood
    â€¢ Legal NSFW is allowed, but only with Content Warning or NSFW flag
    â€¢ Respect each other
    â€¢ In particular, all forms of transphobia, misogyny, homophobia, racism, etc are strictly prohibited, and will be dealt with in due course. There is no tolerance on shit like this, accounts are suspended without talking, period.
    â€¢ Our servers are under French jurisdiction. French laws do apply here.
    Feel free to report users or toots that don't belong here.

    â€¢ 2 cores Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU C2750 @ 2.40GHz

    freehold.earth

    about

    preview

    join

    Freehold Earth

    Users: 159 . Toots: 1575 . Connections: 586 . Language: English

    Freehold.Earth is a free-speech centered community, extremely lightly moderated (we'll do what we can about spam and harassment, and possibly some management of the federated public timeline, that's about it...do as you please when communicating with followers!). More info at https://freehold.earth/about/more

    More Info...

    Welcome!

    The unifying theme of Freehold.Earth is free speech. We welcome people from all walks of life, even those we donâ€™t particularly like, to have a voice in the world. While the initial round of invites mostly went to folks from the infosec and free speech advocacy communities, registration is open whenever our capacity limitations permit.

    However, if you are the sort of person who wants those you deem to be â€œbad peopleâ€ or holders of â€œdangerous opinionsâ€ ejected from the communityâ€¦this is not the place for you. I guarantee that no matter your ideological bent, there will be someone here you deem bad/dangerous.

    What does this mean in terms of user experience?

    The admins donâ€™t want to hear about your problems with anyone you havenâ€™t both muted and blocked. Itâ€™s your job to step away from speech that is troubling to you. We will take action to:

    • Try to mitigate spam problems.
    • Try to intervene in harrassment, defined specifically as a user persistently contacting another user who has already muted and blocked them. If you didnâ€™t mute and block, they arenâ€™t harrassing you, though they may be annoying. Annoying is not on the list of things we care about.
    • Try to mitigate actual security issues.
    • Encourage a tolerant and open community where users can control which content they produce and engage with.

    Note the use of â€œtryâ€ and â€œencourageâ€â€¦there are things we simply do not control, and we will not sacrifice free speech for everyone in an attempt to make our community a safe haven from all the worldâ€™s ills. Earth is a chaotic place, and Freehold.Earth will likely be so as well.

    What should users know?

    • A â€œpostâ€ (â€œtweetâ€ elsewhere) is called a â€œtootâ€ here. To repeat/amplify a toot is to â€œboostâ€ that toot.
    • We favorite things we like, by clicking the star on the toot.
    • The Local Timeline is all public posts at the moment on Freehold.Earth
    • The Federated Timeline is every public post from anywhere that is seen by Freehold.Earth â€“ the more remote users followed by our users, the more of a firehose this becomes.

    Are there any tips for being loved and followed by many?

    Generally, weâ€™re not here to tell you what to doâ€¦but in case you were wondering what social conventions are popular, consider the following. Observing these tips will also help keep other servers from blocking our traffic!

    • Please use the #NSFW tag for NSFW postsâ€¦this allows other users to filter their view in public places.
    • Please wrap content likely to annoy some of your audience (politics, rants, etc) in a CW (Content Warning).
    • Please donâ€™t use an animated GIF for your avatar.
    • Please place the #bot tag in the profile of any non-human account.
    • Please be a bit kinder than is really called for, and disengage rather than escalate when you see drama starting.
    • When someoneâ€™s being an asshat, please assume itâ€™s out of misunderstanding rather than malice, until they prove you wrong.

    Meet the Freehold.Earth admin team:

    • HedgeMage â€¦This is my server, but Iâ€™m more often active on my personal account, HedgeMage@maly.io than on Freehold.
    • Consentacles â€¦Iâ€™m generally friendlyâ€¦AFTER coffee has been applied.
    • KatamariChaos â€¦I like to boost a good toot.

    Nodes (instances) currently blocked by Freehold.Earth

    **NONE**

    A note on bot accounts:

    We are currently experimenting with silencing followbot accounts to reduce noise in the Federated Timeline at Freehold.Earth.

    • Follow bot traffic should not appear in the Federated Timeline, if it does, feel free to report it so we can silence.
    • Follow bots are NOT under a suspension ban. You can still follow them (and they you) if desired, the traffic just wonâ€™t be in the Federated Timeline. Some followbots will not follow users with #nobot in their profile.
    • It is possible for bots that are not follow bots to get caught up in this ban. If you think you have seen this happening, please contact the admins.

    A follow bot is a bot that indiscriminately follows most/all users it comes across, in an attempt to increase federation between small servers and the rest of the Fediverse. Because their follow choices are random (and some spew statistics as often as every twenty minutes), weâ€™re hoping that removing this traffic will make Freehold.Earthâ€™s Federated Timeline more relevant and interesting to our users.

    This is currently an experiment and may change at any time.

    Email: admins@freehold.earth

    Admin: Not Available

    yomidon.okinawa

    about

    preview

    join

    ãƒ¨ãƒŸãƒ‰ãƒ³

    Users: 12 . Toots: 169 . Connections: 240 . Language: English

    Mastodon for Yomitan Okinawa ãƒ¨ãƒŸãƒ‰ãƒ³ã¯èª­è°·æ‘å†…åœ¨ä½è€…ãƒ»å‡ºèº«è€…ãƒ»æ‘å†…å‹¤å‹™è€…åŠã³èª­è°·æ‘å¥½ããªäººã®ãŸã‚ã®Mastodonã§ã™ï¼

    More Info...
    Contact
    ogaworks @ogaworks

    Admin: @ogaworks@yomidon.okinawa

    â€»é€€ä¼šå‡¦ç†ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã¯ã€ç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã«ã¯ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã®ã§ã€ç®¡ç†è€…ã«ã”é€£çµ¡é ‚ã„ã¦ã‚‚å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã‹ã­ã¾ã™ã€‚äºˆã‚ã”äº†æ‰¿ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚é€€ä¼šã«è¿‘ã„å‡¦ç†ã‚’è¡Œã„ãŸã„æ–¹ã¯ã€ã”è‡ªèº«ã§ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’å¤–ã—ã€ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å¤‰ãˆã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ¨ã¦ã‚¢ãƒ‰ã«å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ç­‰ã®å¯¾å¿œã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦é ‚ãå¿…è¦ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3ã€€ç­‰WEBä¸Šã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã”å‚ç…§ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚
    â€»åˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¦ã”å ±å‘Šè‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒåˆ¥é€”å®šã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã‚’é™¤ãã€æœ¬ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ä¸Šã«è¦ç´„ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ãŸæ™‚ç‚¹ã‚ˆã‚ŠåŠ¹åŠ›ãŒç”Ÿã˜ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ediot.social

    about

    preview

    join

    EDiot Social

    Users: 24 . Toots: 254 . Connections: 338 . Language: English

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica is the greatest haven of free expression in the world... and we aren't content with a single site anymore.

    So here is our one and only Mastodon Instance. Here we accept everyone! No Limits , No Domain Blocks , No Bullshit .

    This Instance is a place for everyone to share and discuss dank memes , awful jokes and pointless internet drama . We aim to bring together the shittiest communities of Twitter and beyond to form one website filled with the latest trends , memes and again, pointless internet drama .
    Please ensure you check your spam folder for the confirmation email when signing up, it commonly gets stuck in there.

    More Info...

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica Wiki

    ED: Thizzlehat Junction Center


    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica Forums

    EDF2: Electric Boogaloo


    Email

    EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica general inquiries: contact@edrama.co

    Mastodon Social Instance Maintainers: bane@edrama.co & vx@edrama.co

    Note: Not everyone with an EncyclopÃ¦dia Dramatica affiliated email address is an official ED representative. Email an above address to make sure the person who you're communicating with officially represents ED.

    Email: See below for more contact info.

    Admin: @VarickXenos@ediot.social

    Mastodon on Devloprog

    Users: 13 . Toots: 330 . Connections: 320 . Language: FranÃ§ais

    Contact:

    postmaster@devloprog.org

    The big boss

    @admin

    More Info... Ceci est une instance privÃ©e, situÃ©e en France, chez un Geek barbu, papa 2 fois et heureux. Si vous n'avez pas de mail de confirmation, merci de me contacter si vous voulez vous inscrire :)
    There are no restrictions of content on this instance, however, to keep it pleasant to everyone here are a few rules, which will be completed over time.
    Any user not respecting these rules may get silenced or suspended.
    Also remember you have the ability to report users if they don't respect these rules.
    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are prohibited
    Parodic accounts are accepted but must mention they are parodic in their description

    Email: postmaster@devloprog.org

    mastodon.dotopia.dk

    about

    preview

    join

    Doot:opia

    Users: 35 . Toots: 1074 . Connections: 488 . Language: English

    Mastodon instance run by Denmark based tech activism collective DO:TOPIA . This space is open to all. Especially tech and federation network newbies. This is a well tended garden. Be nice to members of this and other instances.

    More Info...

    We follow the same guidelines as mastodon.social . I.e. this is not your platform i you are a nazi, fascist, alt right troll, terf, brocialist, white supremacist or anything else oppressive and nasty.

    This instance is run by queers, nerds and outcasts in general.

    We expect participants to be extra courteous and empathetic towards those who are marginalized or opressed in meatspace societies.

    For those who are new to terms like "safer spaces", "norm criticism", "intersectional analysis" and "hegemonic masculinities"; We won't ban you for needing some time to learn, but if someone calls you out please listen and be kind to those more vulnerable than you. You might learn something new.

    We expect everyone to invest in building a nurturance culture that all well-meaning members can benefit from.

    Email: info@dotopiacph.org

    Admin: Not Available

    anti.energy

    about

    preview

    join

    so very tired

    Users: 85 . Toots: 2915 . Connections: 863 . Language: English

    NO. FUCKING. NAZIS.

    More Info...

    This instance tracks https://github.com/d3vgru/mastodon which is a dev fork of Mastodon so it might not be like totally stable or anything.

    I am fairly anti-instance-block. I reserve the right but I'd really rather let users make their own sense of it.

    This particular instance should be considered experimental. I am currently tracking Mastodon releases but reserve the right to apply my own changes to the code and deploy them at any time. An example would be if an instance were making undue demands on resources and I found a way to throttle them without blocking.

    I want to replace the backend with a pure node API I am writing, then replace the web UI with something a little more my style. ReactJS? I dunno we'll see what's cool in 6 months. VueJS and Quasar. Trying to figure out the best way to let users still load the Mastodon UI if they like it.

    If I can get the new UI working, I'd like to add P2P capabilities so these networks can run more like torrent sharing and less like downloading from a server.

    Email: superbranch@riseup.net

    Admin: @superbranch@anti.energy

    mast.eu.org

    rich.gop

    about

    preview

    join

    Rich.GOP

    Users: 160 . Toots: 2923 . Connections: 942 . Language: English

    Contact:

    motoma@gmail.com

    Motoma :motorcycle:

    @Motoma

    More Info...

    Rich.GOP is an open, privacy-conscious, decentralized social network, dedicated to honest, open, and civil political discourse.

    This instance is funded and maintained by @Motoma

    One of the incredibly important pieces of a decentralized social network is diversity of options. To that end I maintain a public Mastodon instance at https://rich.gop . This instance is free of ads, marketers, and stalkers.

    I provide this service on a virtualized infrastructure that I own. I would like to improve that infrastructure, in the dimensions of availability, reliability, and speed. Users of a free and public tools shouldn't be beholden to a second-rate service. Here, I leverage my 13 years of professions distributed software development and hosting experience to deliver a first-class experience to my users.

    If you would like to support me in my goal of delivering this quality service to the public, please consider supporting this site on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/motoma

    Email: motoma@gmail.com

    Admin: @Motoma@rich.gop

    social.glados.ch

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon on GLaDOS

    Users: 212 . Toots: 929 . Connections: 660 . Language: English

    Bienvenue sur l'instance Mastodon de GLaDOS.ch. Pour toutes questions ou demandes merci de contacter celri[at]glados.ch (attention je ne suis pas support technique pour Mastodon).

    Welcome to the Mastodon instance of GLaDOS.ch. For any questions or requests please contact celri[at]glados.ch (note : I am not technical support for Mastodon).

    Mastodon v1.4.0.2

    More Info...

    Quelques rÃ¨gles
    Some rules

    • Soyez sympa entre-vous.
      Be nice with each other.
    • Quand c'est nÃ©cessaire utilisez, s'il vous plait, les tags NSFW sur les photos et le content warning.
      When it's necessary, please use NSFW tags on photos and content warning.
    • Vous avez la possibilitÃ© de reporter les toots, n'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  le faire si besoin.
      You have the possibility to report toots, do not hesitate.

    Email: celri@glados.ch

    Admin: @celri@social.glados.ch

    fosstodon.org

    about

    join

    Fosstodon

    Users: 5 . Toots: 86 . Connections: 99 . Language: English

    Contact:

    mail@fosstodon.org

    Kev Quirk

    @kev

    Fosstodon is a Mastodon instance that is dedicated to Free & Open Source Software, or FOSS as many call it.

    Fosstodon is for people who are interested in open source technology and the awesome community around it. Whether that be Linux, open source software like Firefox, or Mastodon itself. If you're interested in technology, Fosstodon is a great place to start.

    Email: mail@fosstodon.org

    Admin: @kev@fosstodon.org

    Cette instance de Mastodonte est ouverte Ã  tous, elle est principalement dÃ©diÃ©e au jeu de rÃ´le sur table, mais par extension, ouverte Ã  toutes discussions en rapport avec le jeu de rÃ´le et les mondes imaginaires.

    RÃ¨gles d'usage de ce rÃ©seau social

    (en cours de rÃ©daction)

    PrÃ©sentation et nouveaux

    A votre premiÃ¨re connexion, ou lors de vos premiÃ¨res connexions, merci de vous prÃ©senter avec le tag #introduction .

    Utilisation des hashtags

    N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  marquer vos publications de hashtags pour permettre de les organiser aisÃ©ment les diffÃ©rentes discussions autour d'un mÃªme sujet.

    Annonces d'Ã©vÃ©nements

    Pour permettre Ã  tous d'Ãªtre au courant des derniers Ã©vÃ©nements qui se dÃ©roulent prÃ¨s de chez eux, utilisez le hashtag #evenement suivi du numÃ©ro du dÃ©partement... par exemple, pour annoncer un Ã©vÃ©nement rÃ´liste dans la Marne, utilisez le hashtag #evenement51

    Recherche de joueurs, parties...

    Mise Ã  jour de vos sites

    N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  nous annoncer les mises Ã  jour de vos sites Internet, blogs, ... Pour cela, crÃ©ez un hashtag avec l'URL de votre site, par exemple #portes-imaginaire.org .

    More Info...
    TÃ©rminos de Uso:

    Este servidor autogestionado estÃ¡ en lÃ­nea solamente por el esfuerzo de su administrador, por lo cual es posible que existan ocasionales bajas del servicio (downtime), durante condiciones meteorolÃ³gicas extremas o cortes de energÃ­a prolongados. Las cuentas registradas en este servidor no pueden ser utilizadas para publicar contenido gore/snuff/pornografÃ­a infantil/pedofilia de ningÃºn tipo, de otra forma su cuenta serÃ¡ eliminada inmediatamente si se detecta esa actividad. Se puede publicar contenido ocasionalmente NSFW, pero inundar los espacios pÃºblicos (flooding) con publicaciones hardcore NSFW puede llevar a la eliminaciÃ³n de su cuenta. Este pod esta en contra de la publicaciÃ³n de contenido racista, sexista, homofÃ³bico o cualquier otro tipo de discriminaciÃ³n, asÃ­ como tambiÃ©n el uso de las cuentas con fines de propaganda/comerciales o de persecuciÃ³n y asedio a otros usuarios. Cuentas creadas en MastodonChile que queden abandonadas, sin publicaciones o suscripciones, serÃ¡n eliminadas en las limpiezas de rutina del servidor de cuentas creadas por bots, por lo tanto si se registra, use su cuenta y pruebe que existe o que no es un bot. Este servidor hace eco de los principios del software libre y nuestro espÃ­ritu militante, es ser un nodo mÃ¡s de una red descentralizada y federada que respeta al usuario y no invade su privacidad.
    AquÃ­ pueden encontrar unas Peguntas Frecuentes .


    Email: walo@eduardohurtado.info

    Admin: @Walo@mastodonchile.club

    chaos.social - because anarchy is much more fun with friends.

    mastodon.me.uk

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.me.uk

    Users: 151 . Toots: 1721 . Connections: 810 . Language: English

    A Mastodon/OSocial server for users in the UK. Originally intended for the tech community, but open to anyone! As this is a volunteer-run server maintained by @floppy , users are required to abide by the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct - if you don't like it, there are plenty of other instances you can use.

    More Info...

    Bot Policy

    Bots are tentatively allowed on this server as long as they are useful, interesting, or amusing. Bots that post excessively, that simply boost or link other posts, that just follow other users, or that produce badly-formed output will be suspended. Contact the admins if you have a problem. Yes, we know it's vague.

    Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct

    Our Pledge

    In the interest of fostering an open and welcoming environment, we as contributors and maintainers pledge to making participation in our project and our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

    Our Standards

    Examples of behavior that contributes to creating a positive environment include:

    • Using welcoming and inclusive language
    • Being respectful of differing viewpoints and experiences
    • Gracefully accepting constructive criticism
    • Focusing on what is best for the community
    • Showing empathy towards other community members

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

    • The use of sexualized language or imagery and unwelcome sexual attention or advances
    • Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, and personal or political attacks
    • Public or private harassment
    • Publishing others' private information, such as a physical or electronic address, without explicit permission
    • Other conduct which could reasonably be considered inappropriate in a professional setting

    Our Responsibilities

    Server maintainers are responsible for clarifying the standards of acceptable behavior and are expected to take appropriate and fair corrective action in response to any instances of unacceptable behavior.

    Server maintainers have the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, and other contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any contributor for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    Scope

    This Code of Conduct applies both within project spaces and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community. Examples of representing a project or community include using an official project e-mail address, posting via an official social media account, or acting as an appointed representative at an online or offline event. Representation of a project may be further defined and clarified by project maintainers.

    Enforcement

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the maintainer at @floppy . All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. The project team is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident. Further details of specific enforcement policies may be posted separately.

    Server maintainers who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct in good faith may face temporary or permanent repercussions as determined by other members of the project's leadership.

    Attribution

    This Code of Conduct is adapted from the Contributor Covenant , version 1.4, available at http://contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4 .

    Email: james@floppy.org.uk

    Admin: @Floppy@mastodon.me.uk

    Quelques rÃ¨gles

    social.strog.org

    about

    preview

    Strog.org

    Users: 1 . Toots: 199 . Connections: 381 . Language: English

    Contact:

    social@strog.org

    DShrauger

    @Strog

    More Info...

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of strog.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive advertising
      2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      3. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    The following domains are blocked by this instance:

    Domain

    Severity

    freezepeach.xyz

    suspend

    sealion.club

    suspend

    shitposter.club

    silence

    social.heldscal.la

    silence

    pawoo.net

    silence + no media

    noagendasocial.com

    suspend

    unsafe.space

    suspend

    porntoot.com

    silence + no media

    gs.archae.me

    silence

    gs.smuglo.li

    suspend

    Email: social@strog.org

    Admin: @Strog@social.strog.org

    Bienvenue sur Shelter, l'instance Mastodon de la petite communautÃ© otaku et geek du discord de l'Eden de la Nanami. Vous pouvez rejoindre le Discord par ce lien.

    Les inscriptions sont pour le moment ouvertes.

    Discussions autour du jeu vidÃ©o, du japon, de l'informatique et de l'animÃ©/manga.

    mastodon.club

    about

    preview

    join

    Moosetodon

    Users: 1771 . Toots: 37363 . Connections: 1462 . Language: English

    A Canadian based Mastodon platform, open to people from everywhere.

    More Info...

    What's a Moosetodonian?

    Official Moosetodonians are people from this local instance who are recognized for their contributions to the community. We recognize monetary donations, code contributions, and community participation and support.

    Supporting This Instance

    Mastdodon.club is a personally created and funded instance. Your generous donations help support the costs of operating and developing new features, which are growing with the size of our local community. Continued donations as small as $3-5 will help ensure the longevity of our instance.

    • Fosspay (official)
    • PayPal.me (alt.)
    • Bitcoin: 39gkNYdkm1u2kUqpkFFAtbjJ4c9MRjvnE5

    A shout-out to Cloud-A Computing for discounting some of the raw infrastructure required to run this community project! It wouldn't be possible without you.

    Code of Conduct

    This instance is for people interacting with other people. Please no corporate shills and direct advertisement. You'll get yourself banned real fast.

    Make use of Content Warnings & NSFW tags for appropriate content. Do not mis-use hashtags, they're not for promoting your products or photography in #introduction or #mastodon.

    No hate speech (contributing or inciting), death threats, illegal activity, link & local stream spamming, etc.

    Bots must respect the #nobot hashtag

    Admin swings ban hammer, rulings final.

    Email: thurloat@moosetodon.ca

    Admin: @thurloat@mastodon.club

    Weapon vs. AC

    neoanderthal

    More Info...

    A moderated RPG-oriented Mastodon instance for the RPG community.

    More information on Weapon vs. AC and our Code of Conduct can be found here .

    The Mastodon User Guide can be found here .

    To report a policy violation, use the 'Report' feature as explained in the Mastodon User Guide.

    Site administrators at Mastodon OSR are:

    The Discordian

    neoanderthal

    If you'd like to help cover the hosting fees and support social media not based around surveillance capitalism , we have a Patreon !

    Email: mastodon@weaponvsac.space

    Admin: @neoanderthal@mastodon.weaponvsac.space
