    off-the-clock.us

    about

    preview

    join

    Off The Clock

    Users: 137 . Toots: 493 . Connections: 443 . Language: English

    Just your run of the mill Mastodon server. We use mail-gun for email notifications, check your spam folder and mark us as "not spam" please.

    Status: http://status.off-the-clock.us/

    More Info... This server is operated by Nick Gerakines, please contact him @ngerakines@off-the-clock.us for questions or issues.

    Rules and Guidelines

    Don't be a jerk -- this goes both ways. Everyone has bad days, so if you are having a bad day then try not to take it out on anyone. If you see someone else having a bad day, try to uplift them.

    This server is meant for personal, non-commercial use. Promoting your services, projects, and products is OK, but don't be excessive. Corporate accounts, organizations, and businesses don't jell with being "off the clock", and probably don't belong here.

    Some content doesn't belong here. I'm generally pretty OK with NSFW content, but please know your audience and use content warnings. Any content that is considered illegal, graphic, or promotes/is hate speech will not be tolerated.

    This really boils down to rule #1, don't be a jerk.

    This server should not be used to transmit sensitive information or secrets. Please do not jeopardize the network, the other accounts on this server, or the operator by having information on here that other people would be interested in.

    If you object to or have a problem with these rules, then you probably don't belong here. They are pretty tame and flexible.

    Blocked Servers The full list of blocked servers can be found here: https://github.com/off-the-clock/blocked-servers

    Email: nick@gerakines.net

    Admin: @ngerakines@off-the-clock.us

    ultima.gaia.ff14-mstdn.net

    join

    Twitterã‚„å¤§æ‰‹ã©ã“ã‚ã€ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯ä»–ã®ã‚¤ã‚«ç³»ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã¯ã€Œä¸éƒ½åˆãŒã‚ã‚‹äººã€ã®ç‚ºã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã€ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã¯é¸æŠè‚¢ã®ä¸€ã¤ã¨ã—ã¦å ´ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã‚‹ã€‚

    å®Ÿé¨“é‹ç”¨ã—ã¦ã¿ã¦æ„Ÿã˜ãŸã®ã¯ã€mastodonã¯ã€Œã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚ã‚Šãã®SNSã€ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã€‚Twitterã‚„Facebookãªã©æ—¢å­˜ã®SNSã¯ã€Œå ´ã«äººãŒé›†ã¾ã‚Šã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’å½¢æˆã™ã‚‹ã€ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã€‚
    æ—¢å­˜ã®SNSã¯ç•°ãªã‚‹ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’æ¨ªæ–­ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«é‹ç”¨ãƒãƒªã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚’åˆ¶å®šã™ã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã©ã†ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã®æ–‡åŒ–ã¨é©åˆã—ãªããªã‚Šå¾—ã‚‹ã€‚
    mastodonã¯ãã®ç‰¹å¾´ã‹ã‚‰èª°ã§ã‚‚ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç«‹ã¦ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã®æ–‡åŒ–ã«åˆã‚ã›ãŸé‹ç”¨ãƒãƒªã‚·ãƒ¼ã‚’æŒã¤ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

    ikasekai.comã¯ç¾åœ¨ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã¨ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’æŠ±ãˆã¦ã„ãªã„ãŒã€é‹ç”¨ãƒãƒªã‚·ãƒ¼ã¨ã—ã¦ã€Œã‚¤ã‚«ã‚’ã‚ˆã‚Šåºƒãæ·±ãæ¥½ã—ã‚€åŠ©ã‘ã‚’ã™ã‚‹ã€ã¨æŒã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ã‚¤ã‚«æ–‡å­—ã®åé›†ã¨ç¿»è¨³ã®ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã€ã‚¤ã‚«ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã‚¤ã‚«ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ³ã®å‰µä½œã‚’åŠ©ã‘ã€ã‚¤ã‚«åŒå¥½ä¼šé ’å¸ƒéŒ²ã§è¡¨ç¾ã—ãŸã„äººã¨èª­ã¿ãŸã„äººã®ç¹‹ãŒã‚‹ã‚­ãƒƒã‚«ã‚±ã‚’åŠ©ã‘ã€ãƒˆãƒ¼ãƒŠãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ã‚„ä½œæˆ¦ç›¤ã§ã‚¤ã‚«ã®éŠã³ã‚’åŠ©ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚ãã‚Œã‚‰ã®åŠ©ã‘ãŒã€ã‚¤ã‚«ã‚’æ¥½ã—ã‚€äººã‚’å¢—ã‚„ã—ã€ã‚¤ã‚«äººå£ãŒå¤šããªã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ç¶™ç¶šçš„ãªã‚¤ã‚«ã®ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ãƒˆã€æ–°ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã®æ–°ã‚¤ã‚«ã€USJã«ã‚·ã‚ªã‚«ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ–ãƒã‚¦ã‚¹ã®å»ºé€ ã‚’æœŸå¾…ã™ã‚‹ã€‚(æœŸå¾…ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ãªã‚‰ã‚¿ãƒ€ã ã‚‚ã‚“ã­ï¼)

    ã‚¤ã‚«ã«é–¢ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ï½³ï½ªï¾™ï½¶ï¾’ï¾ï¾ï¼ã§ã‚‚ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯å‹˜å¼ãªï¼
    ã‚‚ã—ãƒãƒŠãƒ¼ã‚„è¦ç¯„ãŒå¿…è¦ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ã€ŒåŒäººæ–‡åŒ–ã€ã«å‰‡ã£ã¦é‹ç”¨ã™ã‚‹äºˆå®šã€‚
    ã‚ã‚‰ã‚†ã‚‹ã‚¤ã‚«ãƒ‰ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ³ã®å—ã‘çš¿ã¨ãªã‚‹å ´ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    Mastodon - KingDown

    Users: 42 . Toots: 668 . Connections: 523 . Language: English

    Instance Mastodon, hÃ©bergÃ© par l'association Ã  but non lucratif KingDown

    Bonjour et bienvenue sur l'instance Mastodon hÃ©bergÃ© par l'association KingDown !

    Email: association@kingdown.fr

    mastodon.dremtech.fr

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 482 . Toots: 4056 . Connections: 724 . Language: English

    An open Mastodon instance in french and english for tech enthusiasts

    More Info...

    The following guidelines (thanks mastodon.social) are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.dremtech.fr; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive advertising
      2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      3. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence

    2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: dfages@dremtech.fr

    Admin: @dfages@mastodon.dremtech.fr

    ãã®ä»–ç•™æ„äº‹é …

    ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯ã€ã€Œ ãƒ ãƒˆãƒ¼â˜…ç„¡æ–™ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ ã€ã®ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒ³ã«ã¦æ§‹ç¯‰ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®ãŸã‚ã€ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹å†…ã«ä¿æŒã§ãã‚‹ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼æ•°ã‚„æƒ…å ±é‡ã«åˆ¶é™ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãªãŠã€2017å¹´8æœˆ18æ—¥ç¾åœ¨ã€ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã® ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã¨ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’åˆã‚ã›ãŸãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼æ•°ã®ä¸Šé™ã¯100 ã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    å¾“ã„ã¾ã—ã¦ã€ä¸‹è¨˜ã®æƒ…å ±ã«ã¤ãã¾ã—ã¦ã€ äºˆå‘Šãªãå‰Šé™¤ã•ã›ã¦ã„ãŸã ãå ´åˆãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ ã®ã§ã€ã‚ã‚‰ã‹ã˜ã‚ã”äº†æ‰¿ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    • ç¦æ­¢äº‹é …ã«æŠµè§¦ã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®è¶£æ—¨ã«ãµã•ã‚ã—ããªã„ã¨ç®¡ç†è€…ãŒåˆ¤æ–­ã—ãŸã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®æƒ…å ±ï¼ˆã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã„ãŸã—ã¾ã™ï¼‰

    å…è²¬äº‹é …

    Ø¨Ø§ ÙˆØ¬ÙˆØ¯ Ø§ÛŒÙ† Ú©Ù‡ Ù…Ø­ÛŒØ· Ù¾ÛŒØ´â€ŒÙØ±Ø¶ Ù¾Ø±Ø³Ø§Ø¯ÙˆÙ† ÙØ§Ø±Ø³ÛŒ Ø§Ø³ØªØŒ Ú©Ø§Ø±Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ù† Ø§ÛŒÙ† Ø³Ø§ÛŒØª Ù‡Ù…Ú†Ù†Ø§Ù† Ù…ÛŒâ€ŒØªÙˆØ§Ù†Ù†Ø¯ Ø¨Ø§ Ù‡Ù…Ù‡Ù” Ú©Ø§Ø±Ø¨Ø±Ø§Ù† Ø§ÛŒÙ† Ø´Ø¨Ú©Ù‡Ù” Ø§Ø¬ØªÙ…Ø§Ø¹ÛŒ Ø¯Ø± Ø³Ø±ÙˆØ±Ù‡Ø§ÛŒÛŒ ØºÛŒØ± Ø§Ø² Ù¾Ø±Ø³Ø§Ø¯ÙˆÙ† Ùˆ Ø¨Ø§ Ø²Ø¨Ø§Ù†â€ŒÙ‡Ø§ÛŒÛŒ Ø¬Ø² ÙØ§Ø±Ø³ÛŒ Ù†ÛŒØ² Ø§Ø±ØªØ¨Ø§Ø· Ø¯Ø§Ø´ØªÙ‡ Ø¨Ø§Ø´Ù†Ø¯.     Social ğŸ“¸ Photography

    Users: 22 . Toots: 2216 . Connections: 383 . Language: English

    Contact:

    admin@photog.social

    Ambassador

    @ambassador

    More Info... A place for your photos and banter. Photog first is our motto
    • photog.social doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal information
    • Export and leave anytime
    • Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying, if you do this your account will be deleted
    • All content is â“’ each user and cannot be distributed or used without prior permission by the respective photog.social user
    • By using this site you understand that it is not a backup or permanent repository for your information, statuses or media -- additionally, your media was downsized on original upload and is not exportable at this time upon transferring to new instance
    • You may support the community by boosting and positively interacting with everyone
    • No Porn
    • No Loli
    • No Bots w/o Approval
    • Respect Others

    Email: admin@photog.social

    Admin: @ambassador@photog.social

    ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã€PICæ°‘ã€ã‚’ã”åˆ©ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¯ã€ã¾ãšã¯æ–°è¦ç™»éŒ²ã‚’ã—ã¦ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    ã”åˆ©ç”¨ã•ã‚Œã‚‹ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã®è¨­å®šã«ã‚ˆã£ã¦ã¯ã€è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã€ç­‰ã«å…¥ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ç¢ºèªãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãŒå±Šã‹ãªã„å ´åˆã¯ã€è¿·æƒ‘ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ã‚’ã”ç¢ºèªä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    More Info... ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«
    ãƒ»ã«ã»ã‚“ã®ã»ã†ã‚Šã¤ã¯ã¾ã‚‚ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã‚ã‚‹ã„ã“ã¨ï¼ï¼œã«ã¦ã‚’æŸ“ã‚ã¦ã„ã‚‹æ–¹ã€ã»ã†ã‚Šã¤ã«ãµã‚Œã‚‹ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ç¦æ­¢ï¼ã§ã™ã€‚æœ€æ‚ªã®ã°ã‚ã„ã¯è­¦å¯Ÿã‚„è£åˆ¤æ‰€ã®è¦è«‹ã«å¿œã˜ã¦ã‚ãã‚’ã‹ã„ã˜ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ãªã£ã¡ã‚ƒã†ã‹ã‚‚â€¦ï¼
    ãƒ»ãˆã‚ãã‚ãªã©ã®ç†ç”±ã§18ç¦ã€18ç¦Gç­‰ã«ãªã‚Šãã†ãªæ–‡ç« ã«ã¯Content Warningã‚’ã€ç”»åƒã€ã‚¤ãƒ©ã‚¹ãƒˆã«ã¯NSFWã‚¿ã‚°ã‚’ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ãŸã¨ãˆä»˜ã‘ã¦ã„ã¦ã‚‚ã«ã»ã‚“ã®ã»ã†ã‚Šã¤ã«æŠµè§¦ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ãªç”»åƒã¯ã ã‚ã§ã™ã€‚
    ãƒ»é€£æŠ•ã‚„ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­çˆ†ãªã©ã®éåº¦ã«ã‚ã„ã‚ããŒã‹ã‹ã‚‹TOOTã¯ãã‚“ã—ï¼ï¼ï¼œã§ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã²ã‚“ã˜ã‚ƒãã ã‹ã‚‰ã­ï¼ï¼œï¼
    ã‚¹ãƒ‘ãƒ ã«ã—ã‹è¦‹ãˆãªã„ã‚ˆã†ãªå®£ä¼ã¨ã‹ã‚‚ã‚„ã‚ã¦ã­ï¼
    ãƒ»ã¿ã‚“ãªä»²è‰¯ãã€‚
    ãƒ»å¥½ããªã‚‚ã®ã‚’ã©ã†å¥½ãã‹ã‚’è‡ªåˆ†è‡ªèº«ã®è¨€è‘‰ã§è¡¨ç¾ã§ãã‚‹æ–¹ãŒå‚åŠ è³‡æ ¼ã‚ã‚Šã¨åˆ¤æ–­ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»PublicãªæŠ•ç¨¿ã‚’ã—ãªã„ã“ã¨(Unlisted, Private, Directã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„)ï¼

    Users: 32 . Toots: 236 . Connections: 135 . Language: English

    shiro@powermedia.co.jp

    46ã‚ã©ã¿ã‚“:white_check_mark:

    @furuone2

    pochi46.comï¼ˆã½ã¡åŸ.comï¼‰ã¯ãƒ‘ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ¡ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¢ãŒé‹å–¶ã™ã‚‹Mastodonã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼ˆã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ï¼‰ã§ã™ã€‚ ã€Œæ—¥æœ¬ã®ãŠåŸã‚’æ„›ã™ã‚‹æ–¹ã€ãªã‚‰ã€ã©ãªãŸã§ã‚‚å¹…åºƒãä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã¾ã™ã€‚
    ã§ã€Œã½ã¡åŸã€ã£ã¦ãªã«ã‚ˆï¼Ÿ â‡’ãƒãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒ³ã‚°ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ„ã¿ãŸã„ãªã‚‚ã‚“ã§ç‰¹ã«æ„å‘³ã¯ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚æ°—ã«ãªã‚‹æ–¹ã¯ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã¾ã§

    Email: shiro@powermedia.co.jp

    Admin: @furuone2@pochi46.com

    a.weirder.earth

    about

    preview

    join

    a weirder earth

    Users: 269 . Toots: 13900 . Connections: 1016 . Language: English

    Hi and welcome to a weirder earth ! This is a mastodon instance, which means that if you create an account here you can use it to interact with mastodon users across all other instances. Think of it as a low-key distributed twitter. This instance is hosted and maintained by @mykola@a.weirder.earth, so if there's a problem please reach out to him. Anything awesome you find here, though, is the result of a wonderful community! :)

    a weirder earth itself is meant to be a community that skews thoughtful and weird. Everyone who abides by the code of conduct is welcome, thoughtful weirdos most of all! :)

    If you run into trouble registering, ping @mykola here or on twitter for help.

    More Info...

    Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, but if you do know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

    • Own Your Weird - This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Be true to yourself and let others do the same.
    • Share Your Weird - Talk about the weird shit you're into! Talk to other people about the weird shit they're into! Make weird shit together! Post your art! Bots welcome!
    • Cultivate the Weird - Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.
    • Keep A Weirder Earth Weird! - no brands, no marketing, no data-miners. You're here to use it for its social function, not to exploit it for some other purpose.
    • Banal Bullshit Unwelcome - there's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't weird, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    eigadon.net

    about

    preview

    join

    æ˜ ç”»ãƒ‰ãƒ³ï¼æ˜ ç”»ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã€æ˜ ç”»æ¥­ç•Œã§åƒãæ–¹ã®ç‚ºã®æ—¥æœ¬åˆã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚

    Users: 818 . Toots: 13828 . Connections: 1641 . Language: English

    æ˜ ç”»ãƒ‰ãƒ³

    â€»ä»–ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¯åŸå‰‡ç¦æ­¢ã§ã™ã€‚æœ¬ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¨ã¯é–¢ä¿‚ã®ãªã„ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒå¤§å¹…ã«å¢—ãˆã‚‹ã®ã§ã€ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ãŒé…ããªã£ãŸã‚Šã€HDDã®å®¹é‡ãŒä¸€æ¯ã«ãªã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã†ãªã©ã®å¼Šå®³ãŒå‡ºã‚‹ç‚ºã§ã™ã€‚ä»–ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã®ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã¯ã€pawoo.netã‚„friends.nicoç­‰ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ãŠé¡˜ã„è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    â€»ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¨é–¢ä¿‚ã®ãªã„å®£ä¼ç›®çš„ã®ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã¯å³æ™‚ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤è‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚è²§å¼±ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãªã‚“ã§ã™ã€‚
    â€»æœæŸ»æ©Ÿé–¢ç­‰ã‹ã‚‰ã®è¦è«‹ãŒæ¥ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ç­‰ã®å€‹äººæƒ…å ±ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    â€»ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼è²»ç”¨ç­‰ã®è² æ‹…ãŒçµæ§‹å¤§ãã„ç‚ºã€ä»Šå¾Œé‹å–¶è²»ã‚’è³„ã†ç‚ºã«ã€åºƒå‘Šç­‰ãŒå…¥ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚æœ€çµ‚çš„ã«æ¯æœˆã‚¦ãƒ³åä¸‡ç¨‹åº¦ã®ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼è²»ç”¨ãŒæ›ã‹ã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ã‚‚ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã”æŠ•ç¨¿é ‚ã„ãŸãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã¯ã€å¤šåª’ä½“ã§ã®ç´¹ä»‹ã‚„äººå£çŸ¥èƒ½ã‚’ç”¨ã„ãŸã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã§åˆ©ç”¨ã•ã›ã¦é ‚ãå ´åˆãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚åç›ŠãŒç™ºç”Ÿã—ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€é‹å–¶ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ç¶™ç¶šã•ã›ã‚‹ç‚ºã®è²»ç”¨ï¼ˆã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ä»£ã€é‹å–¶è²»ç­‰ï¼‰ã«å……ã¦ã•ã›ã¦é ‚ãã¾ã™ã€‚
    â€»é€€ä¼šå‡¦ç†ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã¯ã€ç¾åœ¨ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã«ã¯ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã›ã‚“ã®ã§ã€ç®¡ç†è€…ã«ã”é€£çµ¡é ‚ã„ã¦ã‚‚å¯¾å¿œè‡´ã—ã‹ã­ã¾ã™ã€‚äºˆã‚ã”äº†æ‰¿ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚é€€ä¼šã«è¿‘ã„å‡¦ç†ã‚’è¡Œã„ãŸã„æ–¹ã¯ã€ã”è‡ªèº«ã§ãƒˆã‚¥ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚’å‰Šé™¤ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ­ãƒƒã‚¯ã—ã€ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚’å¤–ã—ã€ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’å¤‰ãˆã€ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚¢ãƒ‰ãƒ¬ã‚¹ã‚’æ¨ã¦ã‚¢ãƒ‰ã«å¤‰æ›´ã™ã‚‹ç­‰ã®å¯¾å¿œã‚’è¡Œã£ã¦é ‚ãå¿…è¦ãŒã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ https://digitalnews365.com/mastodon-3ã€€ç­‰WEBä¸Šã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ã”å‚ç…§ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚
    â€»åˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„ã«å¤‰æ›´ãŒã‚ã£ãŸå ´åˆã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã«ã¦ã”å ±å‘Šè‡´ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚å½“ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ãŒåˆ¥é€”å®šã‚ã‚‹å ´åˆã‚’é™¤ãã€æœ¬ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ä¸Šã«è¦ç´„ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã—ãŸæ™‚ç‚¹ã‚ˆã‚ŠåŠ¹åŠ›ãŒç”Ÿã˜ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    resipsa.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Microblogging for Legal Professionals

    Users: 21 . Toots: 199 . Connections: 514 . Language: English

    resipsa.social is a microblogging platform, or more accurately an instance of the Mastodon platform, for legal professionals.

    This instance was originally intended to be for legal professionals, but all who respect the rules are welcome. In general, the rules are simple: be respectful of others -- their privacy, their content, and their right to be free from harassment. Don't be a bad seed.

    Email: andrew@leahey.org

    Admin: @Andrew@resipsa.social

    sanguine.merylscarlett.info

    BSSN [Sanguine.Merylscarlett.Info]

    Users: 4 . Toots: 741 . Connections: 285 . Language: English

    Contact:

    eyeshadow2600fm@gmail.com

    Meryl, the Blood Queen

    @mskavanagh

    More Info...

    Welcome to the new BSSN

    This is a Mastodon instance dedicated to those who enjoy supernatural type themes, especially including vampires! But, also, this is a space for marginalized people to be away from abusive types. Nazis, white supremacists and people who like them will not be tolerated here. This is not a freeze peach zone.

    My Website Forum REVOSA Radio Patreon

    Email: eyeshadow2600fm@gmail.com

    Admin: @mskavanagh@sanguine.merylscarlett.info

    computerfairi.es

    about

    preview

    join

    Computer Fairies

    Users: 182 . Toots: 22426 . Connections: 890 . Language: English

    Computer Fairies is a Mastodon instance that aims to be as queer, friendly and furry as possible. We welcome all kinds of computer fairies!
    Mascot art by @blackle

    More Info...

    Guidelines:

    • We (the admins) will not tolerate any sort of discrimination
    • Basically, don't be a jerk and you'll be ok
    • We reserve the right to remove anyone from this instance for being a jerk at our discretion, after fair warning depending on the case.

    Blocked Instances

    All blocked instances have media blocks regardless of block type.

    The following GNU Social instances are blocked due to a majority of them openly harrassing people, associations with 4chan, and incompatibilities with Mastodon's post privacy settings.

    Last updated 29/06/2017

    Domain Block Reason
    social.heldscal.la Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment
    sealion.club Suspend GNU Social instance
    gs.kawa-kun.com Suspend GNU Social instance
    pawoo.net Silence Lolicon
    anitwitter.com, anitwitter.moe Silence Lolicon
    rainbowdash.net Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment
    freezepeach.xyz Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment
    woofer.alfter.us Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment under guise of "free speech"
    social.au2pb.net Suspend GNU Social instance
    gorf.club Suspend GNU Social instance
    gs.smuglo.li Suspend GNU Social instance, lolicon
    unsafe.space Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment
    wrongthink.net Suspend Harrassment under the guise of "free speech"
    noagendasocial.com Suspend Harrassment under the guise of "free speech"
    maly.io Silence Harrassment under the guise of "free speech" (suspected)
    ediot.social Suspend Harrassment, Encyclopedia Dramatica
    memetastic.space Suspend Harrassment
    shitposter.club Suspend GNU Social instance, harrassment
    social.tchncs.de Suspend Admin's complacency with harrassment
    gs.archae.me Suspend GNU Social instance, boosts from shitposter.club and freezepeach.xyz
    social.nofftopia.com Suspend Offensive behaviour from instance admin
    sdfn-01.ninjawedding.org Suspend CSS injection abuse
    now.kibousoft.co.jp Suspend CSS injection abuse
    ika.moe Suspend Requested by ika.moe's admin
    social.targaryen.house Suspend Harboring hate speech
    mastodon.starrevolution.org Suspend Harassment personally directed at computerfairi.es admin

    ohai.su

    about

    preview

    join

    ohai.su mastodon

    Users: 67 . Toots: 1017 . Connections: 768 . Language: English

    ohai.su

    More Info...

    Code of Conduct

    As tooters on this instance, we pledge to uphold an environment that is radically inclusive with respect for all users of the instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance an oppression-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    We define oppression as any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathizes with any form of systemic social domination.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized / violent language or imagery at non-consenting parties, on the public timeline, or without the nsfw filter
  • Personal attacks
  • Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments
  • Public or private oppressive language or actions
  • Other unethical conduct

    • Users are empowered and responsible for addressing any abuses of the Code of Conduct such that the project remains an oppression-free experience.

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, users commit themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of using this instance. users who do not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently banned.

    This Code of Conduct applies both to toots on ohai.su and to public spaces when an individual is representing ohai.su or its community.

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting an admin by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: lukas@fnordserver.eu

    Admin: @lutoma@ohai.su

    cuttlefi.sh

    about

    preview

    join

    Cuttlefish

    Users: 6 . Toots: 36 . Connections: 20 . Language: English

    Cuttlefish

    More Info...

    By charging a small monthly amount, Cuttlefish can pay its costs and its development team a fair wage and distribute the rest back to its members.

    Cuttlefish is in the early stages of formation. We have an idea of how weâ€™d like it to operate, but are figuring out the details as we go. The answers below sketch our current thinking about the project and the direction we hope to go in the future.

    Q&A

    Why shouldnâ€™t I sign up for a free social network?

    You can, and if you prefer you should. Cuttlefish is an alternative that attempts to answer the question of how a social network can be run without showing you ads or selling your information. Since Cuttlefish runs inside a larger OStatus network, members can interact with a larger community of users.

    Mastodon was written by volunteers, and other instances are run by volunteers as well. Why not donate your time instead of asking for money?

    The progress that the maintainers and contributors to Mastodon and OStatus is impressive, and their dedication to the stewardship of these projects is admirable. Our focus is on creating a sustainable instance, and we think that means having a dedicated staff working on the project. That gives us time to devote to moderation, maintenance, and contributing back to the open source projects that are being used to run Cuttlefish. We donâ€™t think that this would be possible if running Cuttlefish was treated as a side project.

    Why not just accept donations?

    Accepting donations leads to some members having undue influence in the community, because their donations are required to cover operating costs. We ask each user to contribute equally to the cost of running the service, with the hope of returning membership fees to active members.

    What do you mean by active members?

    At this point, just members in active standing. In the future, this might also include looking at who is posting good stuff within their local network. We realize that add more terms to unpack, and raises more questions than it resolves. Our goal is to promote a healthy community, and we will be looking at how different means of profit-sharing might help that being achieved.

    How are membership fees redistributed?

    Our intention is to do this on a quarterly basis, and initially by equally dividing profit between members. During the initial quarter of a membership, the amount returned will be based on the percentage of the quarter for which the membership was active.

    How are the operating costs determined?

    Currently we are basing our operating costs on having one developer, one community moderator, and a part-time operations manager work on the project. There are also legal issues that require counsel that will need to be addressed in the initial months of operation. We estimate operating costs for the first month to be around twelve thousand US dollars. We will be publishing our actual operating costs quarterly, and revising that estimate to account changes in staffing.

    Who is running this instance?

    Cuttlefish is currently solely sponsored by the team at Standard Library , a small development firm that works inside of the cultural sector. We have a strong experience in building and maintaining Rails applications.

    Email: cuttlefishcoop@gmail.com

    Admin: @root@cuttlefi.sh

    æŠ•ç¨¿ã®æ³¨æ„äº‹é …

    çŠ¯ç½ªäºˆå‘Šã‚„ä»–è€…ã®æ¨©åˆ©ã‚’ä¾µå®³ã™ã‚‹æŠ•ç¨¿ãªã©ã¯å—ã‘ä»˜ã‘ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚
    ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®æŠ•ç¨¿ã¯äºˆå‘Šãªãå‰Šé™¤åŠã³æŠ•ç¨¿è€…ã‚¢ã‚«ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒˆã®åœæ­¢ç­‰ã®æªç½®ã‚’è¡Œã†å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã‚µã‚¤ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼†ã‚¤ãƒãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚°ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ï¼ˆS&II;ï¼‰å”è­°ä¼šã®è¨­ç«‹ã«åˆã‚ã›ã¦ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ãŸãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚ ï¼ˆå”è­°ä¼šã®è¶£æ—¨ãƒ»ç›®çš„ï¼‰

    ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ é–‹ç™ºç®¡ç†ã¯ æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾è§’å·ã‚¢ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ç·åˆç ”ç©¶æ‰€ ãŒæ‹…å½“ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚„ãƒ™ãƒ³ãƒãƒ£ãƒ¼æ”¯æ´ã®åˆ†é‡ã§æ´»èºã™ã‚‹ã€æ”¯æ´äººæã®è‡ªå¾‹çš„ãªã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£å½¢æˆã®é‡è¦æ€§ã‚’æå”±ã™ã‚‹ã¹ãã€å†…é–£åºœã¯ã€ã‚µã‚¤ã‚¨ãƒ³ã‚¹ï¼†ã‚¤ãƒãƒ™ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒ†ã‚°ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ (ä»¥ä¸‹ã€S&II;) å”è­°ä¼šã€ã‚’2017å¹´7æœˆ27æ—¥ä»˜ã‘ã§ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚
    S&II;ã®è¶£æ—¨ã‚„ç†å¿µã«è³›åŒã—ã€ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®å‹•ãã«é–¢ã‚ã‚‹äººã€…ã«ã¨ã£ã¦ã®ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£å½¢æˆã«æ´»ç”¨ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹å ´ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã¹ãç”Ÿã¾ã‚ŒãŸã®ãŒã€ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚S&II;ã«é–¢ã‚ã‚‹å¤šãã®æ–¹ã€…ã«ãœã²ã”å‚åŠ ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’é¡˜ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    æœ¬ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã¯ã€æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾è§’å·ã‚¢ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ç·åˆç ”ç©¶æ‰€ãŒã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã‚’æä¾›ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã§ã€ã™ã¹ã¦ã®æ¨©åˆ©ãƒ»ç®¡ç†æ¨©ã¯ã€æ ªå¼ä¼šç¤¾è§’å·ã‚¢ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒ¼ç·åˆç ”ç©¶æ‰€ã«å¸°å±ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    æœ¬ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã¯ä¸‹è¨˜é‹å–¶ãƒãƒ¼ãƒ ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãŒä¸»ä½“ã¨ãªã£ã¦é‹å–¶ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    • æ—¥æœ¬ã®æ³•å¾‹ãƒ»å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã«åã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚ºã¯ç¦æ­¢ã©ã™

    å…è²¬äº‹é …

    å€‹äººãŒè¶£å‘³ã§ç«‹ã¦ãŸã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚„ã•ã‹ã„ã€ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®æ°¸ç¶šæ€§ã¯ä¿è¨¼ã§ãã¾ã¸ã‚“ã€‚ã€Œä¸‡ãŒä¸€ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿ãŒæ¶ˆãˆã¦ã‚‚å•é¡Œãªã„ã§ã€ã¨æ€ã†ã¦ãã ã•ã‚‹ã€å¿ƒã®åºƒã€œã„æ–¹ã®ã¿ã”ç™»éŒ²ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    no description

    no description

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: Not Available

    mstdn.nl

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon NL

    Users: . Toots: . Connections: . Language: English

    Deze Mastodon instantie wordt vanuit Nederland gehost, voert Nederlands als standaard taal voor alle menu's, knoppen en uitleg en is dus vooral gericht op Nederlandstalige gebruikers. Registratie is open: kies een gebruikersnaam en wachtwoord, bevestig per email en ga aan de slag!

    More Info...

    This Mastodon instance is hosted in The Netherlands and has Dutch as the default interface language. If you're more comfortable using another language, you can change the language under Preferences ("Voorkeuren").

    Wat is Mastodon?

    Mastodon is een gedecentraliseerd sociaal netwerk. Dat wil zeggen dat er geen bedrijf achter zit die als doel heeft zoveel mogelijk te verdienen aan gebruikers door bijvoorbeeld advertenties te plaatsen, surfgedrag van gebruikers op internet te "tracken" met cookies en die verzamelde data door te verkopen aan andere partijen.

    Over de hele wereld verspreid zijn er honderden zgn. 'instanties', een beetje een technische programmeurs term. Maar een instantie is zeg maar een portaal, een hub, een plek waar je je kunt aanmelden en via waar je kunt communiceren met Mastodon gebruikers wereldwijd.

    Alle instanties worden gerund door vrijwilligers die behalve hun tijd en liefde ook server ruimte en bandbreedte beschikbaar stellen aan het sociale netwerk. De software waar Mastodon op draait is open source - dus ook dat wordt onderhouden door vrijwilligers die via Github hun code delen met Mastodon. Zowel het werk als de kosten worden dus door honderden enthousiastelingen gedeeld.

    Hoe werkt het?

    Als je eenmaal bent aangemeld zul je zien dat je verschillende 'tijdlijnen' hebt:

    • Je eigen tijdlijn
    • Een lokale tijdlijn
    • Een gefedereerde tijdlijn

    Net als op andere sociale media platforms kun je status updates posten (op Mastodon heten die "toets" - of "toots" in het Engels: je toetert dus!), anderen volgen, "toets" van anderen delen (een "boost" geven), aanklikken als "favoriet" en op reageren.

    Je eigen tijdlijn

    Op je eigen tijdlijn ("Home") zie je zowel openbare als besloten berichten van degenen die jij volgt, zowel hun eigen "toets" als "boosts" die ze doen van andere gebruikers.

    Lokale tijdlijn

    Op de lokale tijdlijn zie je de openbare status updates en boosts van andere gebruikers die zich via @mstdn.nl hebben aangemeld.

    Gefedereerde tijdlijn

    Weer zo'n ongemakkelijk woord. Maar Mastodon is dus feitelijk een federatie van onafhankelijke websites die elk hun eigen ledenbestand bijhouden. Op de gefedereerde tijdlijn zie je een samenvoeging van alle openbare berichten die gebruikers van @mstdn.nl in hun eigen tijdlijn zien. Daar zitten dus ook veel berichten tussen die afkomstig zijn van andere Mastodon instanties - van gebruikers die door @mstdn.nl gebruikers worden gevolgd. Je ziet daar alleen berichten die door gebruikers zelf zijn geschreven, dus geen "boosts".

    Hoe zit het met m'n gebruikersnaam?

    Je gebruikersnaam kun je een beetje vergelijken met een emailadres. Als je bijv. "alice" als gebruikersnaam hebt dan is je feitelijke Mastodon handle als je op @mstdn.nl bent aangemeld @alice@mstdn.nl - twee apenstaartjes dus! Op een andere instantie kan het heel goed zijn dat daar ook een gebruiker is die "alice" heeft ingevoerd, zo zal Alice op @mastodon.social @alice@mastodon.social als handle hebben. Net als dat er een alice@hotmail.com emailadres en een alice@gmail.com emailadres kan zijn.

    Op @mstdn.nl zal de handle van onze lokale Alice als @alice worden weergegeven, als er op @mstdn.nl berichten worden gedeeld van de Alice van @mastodon.social zal dat worden weergegeven als @alice@mastodon.social. Zo zie je dus meteen wie er lokaal is en wie op een andere instantie zit en kun je de verschillende Alice's makkelijk uit elkaar houden.

    Je kunt je ook aanmelden op meerdere instanties - en wellicht overal dezelfde gebruikersnaam invoeren, of juist verschillende gebruikersnamen. Sommige instanties kunnen gericht zijn op een speciaal onderwerp of doelgroep, sommige gericht op een specifieke taal of lokaliteit. En je kunt dus "toets" van jezelf op andere instanties dan ook weer "boosten" op @mstdn.nl en omgekeerd.

    Is er ook een App?

    Als je op Android zit heb je niet eens een App nodig. In Chrome kun je rechtsboven op het "hamburger menu" klikken waar je onderaan een optie vindt om @mstdn.nl aan je home-screen toe te voegen. Je krijgt dan dus een knop op je home-screen en als je daar op klikt dan opent Mastodon full-screen net als een geinstalleerde App van de Play Store. Is dat op iPhone ook zo?

    Voor iPhone wordt Amaroq vaak genoemd als goede App. Maar er is dus geen officiele centrale App, er zijn verschillende App's van andere partijen.

    Handige links

    instances.mastodon.xyz

    Een aktueel overzicht van alle Mastodon instanties wereldwijd. Je kun hier ook zien hoe het met hun beveiliging is gesteld, over ze open staan voor nieuwe registraties of besloten zijn, wat hun status is.

    Uitgebreide documentatie (Engelstalig)

    Hierboven heb je een beknopte uitleg kunnen lezen, voor volledig documentatie kun je bij de software ontwikkelaars terecht

    Apps

    Een overzicht van verschillende Apps voor verschillende platforms die beschikbaar zijn voor Mastodon.

    Email: mastodon@mstdn.nl

    Admin: @mastodon@mstdn.nl

    social.lovetux.net

    social.lasanha.org

    about

    preview

    Mastodon

    Users: 9 . Toots: 152 . Connections: 466 . Language: English

    social.lasanha.org

    More Info...

    We are following the rules that mastodon.social also uses for moderation, so:

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of social.lasanha.org; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive advertising
      2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      3. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    • The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    • Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: mastodon@luizirber.org

    Admin: Not Available

    mastodon.expert

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon

    Users: 69 . Toots: 412 . Connections: 589 . Language: English

    General, fast, stable and open instance.
    Federate with everyone
    Dedicated to the tech experts, but everyone is welcome!
    Registrations are open, but they may suspended/closed at any time if performance is compromised.

    More Info...
    English version below, this instance is motsly french speaking.
    Le respect de la loi et des autres utilisateurs sont obligatoires.
    Les propos racistes, sexistes, homophobes, etc. sont strictement interdits.
    Les comptes parodiques sont tolÃ©rÃ©s Ã  condition de signaler qu'ils le sont dans leur description.
    Tous les contenus sont tolÃ©rÃ©s dans la limite de la lÃ©galitÃ©, utilisez le content warning pour les contenus inadaptÃ©s au public mineur ou nsfw.
    N'hÃ©sitez pas Ã  signaler tout message ne respectant pas les rÃ¨gles.
    Toute personne ne respectant pas les rÃ¨gles pourra voir son compte suspendu.
    Compliance with the law and respect of other users are mandatory.
    Racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. messages are strictly prohibited.
    Parody account are allowed as long as their parodic status is clearly indicated in their description.
    Any type of content is allowed within the limits of the law, use content warning for nsfw or unsuitable for children contents.
    Feel free to report any message that do not follow the rules.
    Any user who breaks the rules may get suspended without warning.

    Email: contact@mastodon.expert

    Admin: Not Available

    social.csswg.org

    Users: 120 . Toots: 111 . Connections: 408 . Language: English

    @csswg

    Mastodon server for anyone interested in CSS or general web development

    aoisensi

    @aoisensi

    ã‚­ãƒ«ãƒŸã‚¹ãƒˆã®ã‚­ãƒ«ãƒŸã‚¹ãƒˆã«ã‚ˆã‚‹ã‚­ãƒ«ãƒŸã‚¹ãƒˆã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚

    dev.glitch.social

    about

    preview

    join

    dev.glitch.social

    Users: 76 . Toots: 20276 . Connections: 541 . Language: English

    Contact:

    beatrix dot bitrot at gmail dot com

    beatrix 'dev' bitrot

    @bea

    More Info...

    UNSTABLE BUT FRIENDLY

    BE WARNED this instance will absolutely be unstable at times. It will 10000% be used for experimenting with settings and tweaks to Mastodon. So the place may experience outages, not federate reliably with the rest of the world, have posts go missing, or other technical faults. As such it's meant to be a chill, maybe kinda playful place. FOR BREAKING THE SOFTWARE. Time to see what we can do with this thing! Time to Ë¥âˆ€IÆ†OS HÆ†âŠ¥IË¥â…

    the code is here

    This instance also has domain level blocks on numerous others, using the block list found here .

    followbots from other instances will be blocked. please report them

    Some rules

    • Do not engage in harassment of any kind.
    • Racist, sexist and other oppressive slurs will get you suspended, even in non-public conversations.
    • You can post porn and nudity, but you must use the nsfw flag and do not post on the public timeline or you will be silenced (ask around how to make unlisted posts)
    • try to be kind
    • no non-sentient bots until further notice
    • no shit that's illegal in Canada
    • animated gifs should always be marked sensitive/NSFW and identified as animated gifs (for now let's say just putting 'gif' in the text of the toot is sufficient), because they can cause serious problems for people

    some guidelines

    • stuff here is impermanent but i still want this to be as safe a space as we can reasonably make it. let's keep common triggers and angry/ranty/grumpy toots behind CWs
    • free speech maximalists can kindly fuck off. there are instances where that is a priority. this is not one of them.
    • all languages are welcome!

    the privacy stuff in the 'terms' isn't what it should be, but no time to change it yet. this instance's data will not be sold or traded or whatever.

    Email: beatrix dot bitrot at gmail dot com

    Admin: @bea@dev.glitch.social

    slime.global

    about

    preview

    Global Slime Industries

    Users: 31 . Toots: 37600 . Connections: 990 . Language: English

    a safe space for my friends and myself.
    mail: u@fuk.re
    fediverse: @tom@slime.global / @slime@mastodon.social

    More Info...

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of slime.global; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    1. All users, local and remote, are expected to adhere to the following interaction principles:
      1. Respect boundaries as placed by others
      2. Be respectful/apologize if someone tells you that you cross a boundary accidentally
      3. Give people space if you accidentally push past a boundary
      4. If you are on either side of this and are worried about the situation escalating, contact the admin or a mod
      5. Tag potentially upsetting content such as violence/blood, politics, and other such topics
    2. All users, local and remote, will be considered in the wrong in a conversation that goes sour if they participate in the following:
      1. Microaggressions ("not all men", white/man/cis-splaining, etc)
      2. Demanding education on problematic behavior from a non-admin/moderator
      3. Skirting the lines of being a troll
      4. Not tagging potentially sensitive replies
      This is not an exhaustive list. If any of these don't make sense, please speak with an admin or moderator- we are more than happy to help you understand the problems with these kinds of behavior.
    3. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Advertising
      2. News bots that do not tag upsetting content
      3. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    4. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    5. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany, Austria and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    6. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: u@fuk.re

    Admin: @tom@slime.global

    çƒæ­´.com ãŒä½œæˆã—ãŸã€é‡çƒã‚’ã“ã‚ˆãªãæ„›ã™ã‚‹äººé”ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚éŠã³æ–¹ã¯ã€åŸºæœ¬çš„ã«è‡ªç”±ã§ã™ã€‚æœ‰æœ›ãªä¸­å­¦çƒå…ã®è©±ã‹ã‚‰ã€ä»Šæ—¥ã®é˜ªç¥ã‚¿ã‚¤ã‚¬ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã®çµæœã¾ã§ã€å¹…åºƒã„é‡çƒã®è©±ãŒã§ããŸã‚‰ã†ã‚Œã—ã„ã§ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ»å…¬åºè‰¯ä¿—ã«åã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»æ—¥æœ¬å›½å†…ã®æ³•å¾‹ã«é•åã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»ä»–è€…ã«ä¸­å‚·ãƒ»è„…è¿«ãƒ»çµŒæ¸ˆçš„ã‚‚ã—ãã¯ç²¾ç¥çš„ã«æå®³ã‚„ä¸åˆ©ç›Šã‚’ä¸ãˆã‚‹è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»å®Ÿåœ¨ã®äººç‰©ãƒ»å›£ä½“ãªã©ã«ãªã‚Šã™ã¾ã™è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»ä»–è€…ã®è‘—ä½œç‰©ã‚’ç„¡æ–­è»¢è¼‰ã™ã‚‹è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã«æ¥µç«¯ãªè² è·ã‚’ã‹ã‘ã‚‹è¡Œç‚º ãƒ»è¢«å†™ä½“æœ¬äººã‹ã‚‰è¨±å¯ã‚’å¾—ã¦ã„ãªã„ç”»åƒãƒ»å‹•ç”»ã®æŠ•ç¨¿

    wandering.shop

    about

    preview

    join

    Wandering Shop

    Users: 205 . Toots: 13854 . Connections: 603 . Language: English

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics. We welcome everyone who wants to participate, so long as you're willing to abide by our code of conduct .

    Code of Conduct

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone. By joining the Wandering Shop, you're agreeing to abide by our code of conduct .

    More Info...

    The Wandering Shop Code of Conduct

    Welcome!

    The Wandering Shop is a Mastodon instance for the science fiction and fantasy community. We want our 'local' timeline to have the feel of a coffee shop at a good science fiction convention: tables full of friendly conversation on a wide variety of topics.

    We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form.

    Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

    Unacceptable Behavior

    The following behavior is not welcome anywhere in The Wandering Shop:

    • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.
    • Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism.
    • Deliberate or persistent misgendering.
    • Threats of violence.
    • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.
    • Deliberate intimidation.
    • Publishing any individual's address, phone number, or other private identifying information without consent.
    • Sexual depictions of children.
    • Unwelcome sexual attention, including sharing sexual content with specific users without consent.
    • Gratuitous sexual images or behavior without a content warning.
    • Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like â€œ*hug*â€ or â€œ*backrub*â€) without consent or after a request to stop.
    • Publication of non-harassing private communication without consent.
    • Sustained disruption of discussion.
    • Continued communications with someone who's asked that you leave them alone.
    • Unwelcome comments regarding a personâ€™s lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, and employment.

    The following behavior is not allowed on the public timeline:

    • Graphic violent or sexual content without a content warning
    • Gratuitous advertizing or spam. It's fine to promote your work, but it shouldn't be the bulk of what you share.

    Known Harassers:

    The admins may ban or silence users whom we know to be harassers or abusers, even if they have not violated the rules of this instance. The mere presence of a harasser can make past or potential victims uncomfortable, and it can put potential victims who are unaware of the person's history in particular danger. Users are encouraged to individually mute, block, and/or report accounts they don't want to see, but at our discretion, we may take the additional step of blocking or silencing someone instance-wide if we believe they endanger the safe and welcoming space we're trying to maintain.

    Reporting

    The current admins are:

    • Annalee
    • Phildini

      • If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the admins. They'll respond as promptly as they can.

      We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom weâ€™ve received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent.

      Consequences

      Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

      If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from the wandering shop and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

      Credits and License

      This code of conduct is based on Annalee Flower Horne's Sample Slack Code of Conduct , which is in turn based on Geek Feminism's Community Anti-Harassment Policy .

    Email: phildini@phildini.net

    Admin: @phildini@wandering.shop

    mastodon.cloud

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon.cloud

    Users: 38994 . Toots: 1662144 . Connections: 2515 . Language: English

    Contact:

    [emailÂ protected]/* */!function(t,e,r,n,c,a,p){try{t=document.currentScript||function(){for(t=document.getElementsByTagName('script'),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute('data-cfhash'))return t[e]}();if(t&&(c=t.previousSibling)){p=t.parentNode;if(a=c.getAttribute('data-cfemail')){for(e='',r='0x'+a.substr(0,2)|0,n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)e+='%'+('0'+('0x'+a.substr(n,2)^r).toString(16)).slice(-2);p.replaceChild(document.createTextNode(decodeURIComponent(e)),c)}p.removeChild(t)}}catch(u){}}()/* */

    The Admin

    @TheAdmin

    More Info... Welcome to the Fediverse !
    Mastodon.cloud is a free and open instance for people from everywhere !
    You can create your account if you agree with our rules :

    - Racism, xenophobia, homophobia are strictly prohibited.

    - Lolicon, immoral and indecent child pics are strictly prohibited.

    - NSFW is allowed only in Content Warning.

    - Gory, bloody and violent pictures only in Content Warning.

    - Don't be a troll, Don't be a bully.

    - Don't be a jerk, please.

    - You can report every post you judge offensive.

    - We are in the cloud but respect your own country law.


    Thanks to :

    All Contributors, Digital Ocean, Cloudflare and StickerMule.

    Patreon support are welcome !


    Email: contact@mastodon.cloud

    Admin: @TheAdmin@mastodon.cloud

    Users: 165 . Toots: 9071 . Connections: 99 . Language: English

    ã‚¦ãƒŸã‚¬ãƒ¡ã®ã‚¹ãƒ¼ãƒ—ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ã§ã™ã€‚

    ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«

    Nodo uruguayo de la red social libre y decentralizada Mastodon. La misma sigue el estandar abierto OStatus, lo que permite interactuar con otras redes sociales libres.

    AdemÃ¡s proveemos un servidor de chat Jabber/XMPP en paralelo al nodo social, pero en el mismo dominio. Verifica tu carpeta de SPAM por correo de verificaciÃ³n.

    App Android para Mastodon : Tusky

    App Android para Jabber : Conversations

    More Info... Masto.pt Ã© uma instÃ¢ncia do universo Mastodon para pessoas que falam portuguÃªs .
    O universo Mastodon Ã© Ãºnico pois nÃ£o Ã© centralizado e nÃ£o existe uma grande empresa que o controla. O Masto.pt pretende ajudar a encontrar e criar uma comunidade para utilizadores portugueses.
    NÃ£o existem grandes regras para participar. O serviÃ§o Ã© gratuito e se usarem o bom senso nÃ£o terÃ£o qualquer problema.
    Lembramos que isto Ã© um projecto feito da boa vontade e nÃ£o existem garantias de funcionamento. O bom disso Ã© que podes participar, sugerir ou ajudar a melhorar este espaÃ§o.

    w3c.social

    about

    preview

    join

    w3c.social

    Users: 52 . Toots: 400 . Connections: 562 . Language: English

    For people involved in the activities of the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), in Working Groups or Community Groups, and people who follow the work of the W3C. Run on a volunteer basis by Sandro Hawke and others, NOT the W3C systems team, and NOT supported by W3C. Uses the W3C Code of Ethics and Professional Conduct . A place to talk online about the things you would talk about in a meeting, or at a meal with your group. We plan to have a relay-bot soon, so don't feel like you need an account here to be a member of this online community. Please post things you think the W3C community might find interesting!

    More Info...
    Contact
    Sandro Hawke @sandro
    Business e-mail: sandro@w3.org

    Email: sandro@w3.org

    Admin: @sandro@w3c.social

    3 ã€€å‰é …ã®åˆ©ç”¨è¨±è«¾ã«ã¯ã€åœ°åŸŸåˆ¶é™ã€è‘—ä½œæ¨©è¡¨ç¤ºç¾©å‹™ãã®ä»–ä»˜éšæ¡ä»¶ã¯ãªã„ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®å½“ç¤¾ã«å¯¾ã™ã‚‹åˆ©ç”¨è¨±è«¾ã®æœŸé–“ã¯ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒæœ¬ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒ“ã‚¹ã®åˆ©ç”¨è³‡æ ¼ã‚’å¤±ã£ãŸå¾Œã«ãŠã„ã¦ã‚‚ã€æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã®çŸ¥çš„è²¡ç”£æ¨©ãŒå­˜ç¶šã™ã‚‹é™ã‚Šç¶™ç¶šã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚
    4 ã€€å½“ç¤¾åˆã¯å½“ç¤¾ã‹ã‚‰å§”è¨—ã‚’å—ã‘ãŸç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ãŒã€æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã‚’å½“ç¤¾åˆã¯ç¬¬ä¸‰è€…ã®ã‚¦ã‚§ãƒ–ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆç­‰ã«ãŠã„ã¦åˆ©ç”¨åŠã³å…¬é–‹ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã®å ´åˆã€å½“ç¤¾ã¯ã€æŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã«ã¤ã„ã¦ã€è¦ç´„ã€æŠœç²‹ã€ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºå¤‰æ›´åˆã¯åˆ‡ã‚ŠæŠœããªã©ã®æ”¹å¤‰ç­‰ã®è¡Œç‚ºã‚’è¡Œã†å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ã¾ãŸã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã¯ã€å½“ç¤¾ãŒæŠ•ç¨¿å†…å®¹ã‚’åˆ©ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã«ã¯ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒæŠ•ç¨¿åˆã¯é€ä¿¡ã—ãŸéš›ã®ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼IDãã®ä»–ã®ç™»éŒ²äº‹é …ã‚’è¡¨ç¤ºã™ã‚‹å ´åˆãŒã‚ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã‚’äºˆã‚äº†æ‰¿ã™ã‚‹ã‚‚ã®ã¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    DMMã‚ªãƒ³ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒ ã€Œã—ã‚“ã‘ã‚“!!ã€ãƒ•ã‚¡ãƒ³ã®çš†æ§˜ã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚ å…¬å¼ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯ ã“ã¡ã‚‰

    dolphin.town

    about

    preview

    join

    ğŸ¬ Town

    Users: 256 . Toots: 1386 . Connections: 154 . Language: English

    Eeeee! EEEEE, eeeeee!

    dolphin.town is a Mastodon instance where you can only say the letter e. Some instances exist that do not allow this letter. This is not helpful if you are a dolphin.

    Therefore, Darius Kazemi created this instance for all your dolphin-posting needs.

    Email: dolphintown@feeltrain.com

    Admin: @e@dolphin.town

    No Agenda Social

    Users: 3466 . Toots: 147389 . Connections: 1230 . Language: English

    Home to Producers and Fans of the
    No Agenda Show Podcast If you have an issue please DM @adam@noagendasocial.com

    This instance is run by @adam@noagendasocial.com It can be used by anyone, but I reserve the right to suspend or silence. Pretty much anything related to the No Agenda Show Podcast goes, and that is a lot :-) Parody accounts are usually silenced, not suspended. Unless you're actually funny.

    More Info... éŸ³ã‚²ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ ã®ãŸã‚ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚ACå‹¢ã§ã‚‚ã‚¹ãƒãƒ›ã‚²ãƒ¼å‹¢ã§ã‚‚èª°ã§ã‚‚æ­“è¿ã§ã™ï¼ ãƒªã‚¶ãƒ«ãƒˆæŠ•ç¨¿ã‚„ãƒ‡ã‚£ã‚¹ã‚«ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãªã©ã«ã”åˆ©ç”¨ä¸‹ã•ã„ã€‚

    digipres.club

    about

    preview

    join

    The Digipres Club

    Users: 16 . Toots: 179 . Connections: 189 . Language: English

    A place for archivists, programmers, and enthusiasts interested in #digital #preservation to exchange questions, comments, concerns and discoveries!

    More Info...

    This is my first real crack at being a sysadmin, so bear with me here as I lay out a few ideas and groundrules:

    This site is an ongoing project in a few ways: the goals are for people in the #digipres community on Twitter and beyond to get a taste of open-source social networking and its possibilities (and limitations); for ideas and discussion around the constantly-changing world of digital preservation to evolve; and for myself to learn some shit about the internet and how the back end works.

    So, that means a couple of things. First, there's going to be some technical bumps. If something major is happening, let me know (you can still contact me @The_BFOOL on Twitter or via digipresclub at gmail), then have a little patience while I find the time to google several dozen tutorials. FYI, we're currently running on a $10/month Digital Ocean server, so registration will remain open and federated as long as I can maintain it, but I've got no idea how much this can handle before things start breaking.

    Second, in administrating content, I'm going to treat this entire site and its users like contributors on an open-source development project. Meaning as an admin I will enforce, and expect all users to adhere to, the following Code of Conduct (adapted from the Contributor Covenant 1.3.0 ):

    As contributors and maintainers of this project, and in the interest of fostering an open and welcoming community, we pledge to respect all people who contribute to this instance.

    We are committed to making participation in this instance a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of level of experience, gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Examples of unacceptable behavior by participants include:

  • The use of sexualized language or imagery
  • Personal attacks
  • Trolling or insulting/derogatory comments
  • Public or private harassment
  • Publishing other's private information, such as physical or electronic addresses, without explicit permission
  • Other unethical or unprofessional conduct

    • Instance admin has the right and responsibility to remove, edit, or reject posts and any contributions that are not aligned to this Code of Conduct, or to ban temporarily or permanently any user for other behaviors that they deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, or harmful.

    By adopting this Code of Conduct, instance admin commits themselves to fairly and consistently applying these principles to every aspect of managing this project. If multiple admins are invited onboard, any admin who does not follow or enforce the Code of Conduct may be permanently removed from the instance.

    This Code of Conduct applies both within digipres.club as an online space and in public spaces when an individual is representing the project or its community.

    Instances of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behavior may be reported by contacting the instance admin at digipresclub at gmail (currently, that's just one person - if multiple admins are ever added and multiple users given gmail access, I'll revisit this). All complaints will be reviewed and investigated and will result in a response that is deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances. Instance admin is obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

    Email: digipresclub@gmail.com

    Admin: Not Available

    socially.constructed.space

    about

    preview

    Mastodon @ constructed.space

    Users: 4 . Toots: 15064 . Connections: 1149 . Language: English

    socially.constructed.space

    More Info...

    Operating Principles

    Since this instance is small and close-knit enough to make a formal code of conduct or moderation policy a little too heavyweight, instead this will be a description of our operating principles and loose guidelines.

    If you ever have any inquiries, comments or concerns about the conduct of anybody on this server, the operating principles described in this document, or anything else -- direct them all to @KitRedgrave@socially.constructed.space , the admin and caretaker of this server.

    Intentionally Small

    Everyone on this instance is personally known and invited by the admin, in order to keep moderation load and policy to a minimum. The hope is that if anyone has a complaint with a user on this server, we can have a discussion about it and resolve the problem to everyone's satisfaction with a minimum of drama.

    Independence

    The purpose of this instance was, and still is, to be a sort of independent crossroads to talk with any other instance that wants to talk to us. We do not depend on anyone else to tell us what we're allowed and not allowed to do. In particular, we reserve the right to invoke the Nick Fury rule .

    Be Good Neighbors

    The flip side of this is that we have a responsibility to be good neighbors to the rest of the Fediverse. We don't allow any Nazis on this server, and we don't harass anyone. This instance lives and dies on the goodwill of others, especially factoring in the next principle.

    You Can Always Quit

    We believe strongly in voluntary association, and users have the right to delete their posts, remove themselves from conversations, suspend/delete their accounts and leave at any time for any reason. This goes for people on other servers as well -- we respect that you have the right to block, silence or suspend any of our users.

    If you are an admin of your own instance, we respect your right to decide not to federate with us for any reason (though it would be appreciated if you made that fact known and posted somewhere publically visible). Likewise, though we are loath to do so without extenuating circumstances, we reserve the right to not federate with any server for any reason (but we will also make that fact known to you and post it somewhere publically visible).

    Email: 45972610@opayq.com

    Admin: @KitRedgrave@socially.constructed.space

    m.socialjustice.engineering

    about

    preview

    m.socialjustice.Engineering

    Users: 2 . Toots: 20 . Connections: 452 . Language: English

    Engineers, scholars, activists, and community members are welcome on m.socialjustice.engineering to join in 1) cultivating an anticapitalist, feminist engineering praxis for social justice, 2) detecting, publicizing, and addressing harms caused or amplified by engineering, and ultimately 3) reclaiming engineering as a tool in service of societal benefit rather than a force multiplier of oppression.

    Contact
    Business e-mail: hani.awni+admin@socialjustice.engineering

    Email: admin@socialjustice.engineering

    orlando.community

    about

    preview

    join

    Orlando, FL Mastodon Party!

    Users: 7 . Toots: 11 . Connections: 0 . Language: English

    This Mastodon Instance is for folks in and around Orlando, FL, or for those who love the area and want to be involved in discussions around it.

    More Info...

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of orlando.community; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      • Excessive advertising
      • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      • Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    • The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      • Racism or advocation of racism
      • Sexism or advocation of sexism
      • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    • The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      • Sexual depictions of children
      • Content illegal in The United States
      • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism, Nazism, "Alt-Right", or comparable ideologies.
    • Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Modified from the mastodon.social guidelines

    Email: david@orangeblossommedia.com

    Admin: Not Available

    status.ssweeny.net

    Users: . Toots: . Connections: . Language: unknown

    no description

    bne.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Brisbane Social

    Users: 124 . Toots: 2678 . Connections: 1002 . Language: English

    The Brisbane Social Mastodon server. Hosted in sunny Brisbane, for users from and interested in southeast Queensland.

    More Info...

    This site is intended to be a pleasant space for folks to enjoy Mastodon. This instance is run out of Brisbane, Australia to allow faster access for locals.

    Instance rules

    The rules of this server are:

    • Be respectful of your peers
    • Abide by local and international laws
    • Have fun

    If you have concerns about a person's conduct, please report the toot in question or get in touch with @ashkyd .

    Blocked instances

    As with other servers, we have blocked a number of instances that don't meet our standards for a number of reasons. At this time, we are keeping in step with the toot.cafe blocklist.

    If this is something that concerns you, please feel free to sign up for another instance.

    Copyright & Attribution

    The background image of Streets Beach is provided by user Foundationexpo88

    Get started!

    Get started by signing up or logging in , then toot using the #introduction hashtag to say hi!

    Email: bnesocial@kyd.com

    Admin: @ashkyd@bne.social

    é¢¨é‡æ—…äººãŒç¨¼åƒã•ã›ã¦ã„ã‚‹Mastodonã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã§ã™ã€‚ Dockerã‚„Linuxç³»ã§ã¯ç„¡ãæ•¢ãˆã¦FreeBSDã§æ§‹ç¯‰ã—ãŸï¼ˆãã—ã¦åµŒã¾ã‚Šã¾ãã£ãŸï¼‰ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒã¨ãªã£ã¦ãŠã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ ãƒ†ãƒ¼ãƒã¯ä»Šã®ã¨ã“ã‚æœªå®šã€ç¨¼åƒçŠ¶æ³ã‚‚æœªå®šã§ã™ã€‚ ï¼ˆå€‹äººã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãªã®ã§ã€åœé›»ã§åœæ­¢ã€æƒé™¤ã§åœæ­¢ã€æ°—åˆ†ã§åœæ­¢â€¦â€¦è¨­å®šå¤‰æ›´ãªã©ã§å†èµ·å‹•ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã—ã°ã—ã°ã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ï¼‰

    ã“ã“ã¯å±±é™°ã«ã‚†ã‹ã‚Šã‚ã‚‹äººã€…ã®ãŸã‚ã®Mastodonã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚ ã¨ã¯ã„ãˆã€å¿…ãšã—ã‚‚å±±é™°åœ¨ä½ã§ãªãã¦ã‚‚å¤§ä¸ˆå¤«ã§ã™ã€‚å‰ã«å±±é™°ã«ä½ã‚“ã§ã„ãŸã€å±±é™°ã«å‹é”ãŒã„ã‚‹ã€ç¥–æ¯ãŒå±±é™°å‡ºèº«ã€å‡ºé›²å¤§ç¤¾ï¼ˆé³¥å–ç ‚ä¸˜ï¼‰ã«è¡Œã£ãŸã“ã¨ã‚ã‚‹ã€å˜ç´”ã«å±±é™°ãŒå¥½ãã ï¼ ãªã©ãªã‚“ã‹å±±é™°ä»˜ã„ã¦ã‚‹äººãªã‚‰æ°—ãŒå‘ã„ãŸã‚‰ç™»éŒ²ã—ã¦ã‚‚ã‚‰ãˆã‚Œã°ã€‚ã‚†ã£ãŸã‚Šæ¥½ã—ã‚“ã§ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™(à¹‘Â´ï½¥á´—ï½¥`à¹‘)

    Hacklab in Mama and Razmjena vjeÅ¡tina

    We are based in Zagreb, Croatia.

    Hacklab in Mama is a public working space of technology enthusiasts in the Club Mama. Initiated by the group gathered around the Skill Sharing program, the methodology, atmosphere and philosophy of the gatherings quickly spread from the Skill Sharing gatherings on Saturdays to the rest of the week.

    mel.social

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon for Melburnians

    Users: 18 . Toots: 53 . Connections: 219 . Language: English

    mel.social is a small mastodon instance aimed primarily at Melbourne and Victoria based people who want a safe digital space to communicate and be creative. members are encouraged to communication and share their work as long as it adheres to our Code of Conduct

    Please make sure you've familiarised yourself with our Code of Conduct before signing up and if our rules aren't to your liking then there are many other instances that may be better suited to your needs.

    Follow @status for status & maintenance updates. Instance admin is @ajfisher

    More Info...

    mel.social Code of Conduct

    As a user of mel.social, you agree to uphold an environment of respect and empathy for all users.

    Any conduct that is deemed oppressive is grounds for removal from mel.social. Any language or action that expresses, reinforces, upholds or sympathises with any form of systemic social domination is considered oppressive and is grounds for removal at any level deemed appropriate by the Admin.

    Pornography, violence, and fast-blinking images/content should not be used as a profile photo and should always be posted with a "NSFW" tag/content warning.

    The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in a ban from mel.social:

    • Unapproved bots (for approval, please contact @ajfisher )
    • Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
    • Untagged gore and graphic violence
    • Racism or advocation of racism
    • Sexism or advocation of sexism
    • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
    • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

    The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in a ban from mel.social:

    • Sexual depictions of children
    • Holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    • Promoting the oppression of any group based on gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, personal appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, age, religion, or nationality.

    Any conduct intended to stalk, harass, or intimidate other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions is forbidden and subject to punishment up to and including a ban from mel.social.

    This can include, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:

    • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
    • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission.
    • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment.
    • Posting and/or disseminating a person's posts ("toots"), including screen captures or any other content without express permission.
    • Intentionally posting or disseminating libel, slander, or other disinformation.

      • This Code of Conduct applies both to content on mel.social and to public spaces when an individual is representing mel.social or its community.

      Reports of abusive, harassing, or otherwise unacceptable behaviour may be made by using the report button. All reports will be reviewed and dealt with as soon as possible. Admins are obligated to maintain confidentiality with regard to the reporter of an incident.

      The Admin reserves the right to revoke any user's content on or access to mel.social, at any time, for any reason.

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @ajfisher@mel.social

    mastodon.sail42.fr

    about

    preview

    Mastodon

    Users: 1 . Toots: 18 . Connections: 427 . Language: English

    mastodon.sail42.fr

    More Info...
    Contact
    garphy @garphy
    Business e-mail:

    Email: Not Available

    Admin: @garphy@mastodon.sail42.fr

    yoshis.woolly.world

    about

    preview

    Yoshi's Awoolly World

    Users: 1 . Toots: 6 . Connections: 256 . Language: English

    the culmination of a 3 day battle with Docker, message me if you want in

    • birdsite: @knxggles
    • fediverse: @knxggles@mastodon.social / @callum@yoshis.woolly.world
    • email: me@knxggles.xyz

    More Info...

    The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of mastodon.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

    1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline:
      1. Excessive advertising
      2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
      3. Untagged pornography and sexually explicit content
      4. Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
    2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
      1. Racism or advocation of racism
      2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
      3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
      4. Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    3. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service:
      1. Sexual depictions of children
      2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
      3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
    4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:
      1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
      2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
      3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

    These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

    Email: me@knxggles.xyz

    Admin: @callum@yoshis.woolly.world

    Mastodon - ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã•ãã‚‰/CLAMPã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹

    ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã•ãã‚‰/CLAMPã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã€å°å°è§£é™¤ï¼

    ã“ã«ã‚ƒã«ã‚ƒã¡ã¯ï½

  • Mastodonã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ—ã‚¿ãƒ¼ã•ãã‚‰/CLAMPã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ãã‚ã‚ŠãŒã¨ã†ã”ã–ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
    ã•ãã‚‰ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ãŒã€ç‰¹ã«è©±é¡Œã¯é™å®šã›ãšã“ã“ã‚’ãƒ¡ã‚¤ãƒ³ã¨ã—ã¦æ§˜ã€…ãªã“ã¨ã‚’ç™ºä¿¡ã—ã¦ã„ãŸã ã‘ã‚Œã°æœ¬æœ›ã§ã™ã€‚
  • å®‰å®šé‹ç”¨ã¨é•·æœŸæä¾›ã‚’ç›®æŒ‡ã—ã¾ã™ãŒ4/15ã®ç«‹ã¡ä¸Šã’ã‚ˆã‚Šæ—¥æ•°ãŒãŸã£ã¦ã„ãªã„ã®ã¨å€‹äººé‹å–¶ã®ãŸã‚äºˆæœŸã›ã¬ãƒˆãƒ©ãƒ–ãƒ«ã«è¦‹èˆã‚ã‚Œã‚‹å¯èƒ½æ€§ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

  • ç¾çŠ¶ã“ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã¯6CPU/8GBRAMã®ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¦ãƒ‰ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ã§ç¨¼åƒã—ã¦ãŠã‚Šã€ã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¯200GBã§ã™ã€‚ä»Šã®ã¨ã“ã‚ãƒªã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã«ã¯ä½™è£•ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ãŒãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ãŒå¢—ãˆã¦é‡ããªã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã‚ã‚Œã°ã¾ãŸæ¤œè¨ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚

    mastodon.acc.umu.se

    about

    preview

    join

    Mastodon @ UMU

    Users: 10 . Toots: 42 . Connections: 632 . Language: English

    mastodon.acc.umu.se is run by the Academic Computer Club at UmeÃ¥ University located in UmeÃ¥, Sweden.

    Currently registration is only open to users affiliated with UmeÃ¥ University so please use your university email when signing up!

    For those outside of UmeÃ¥ University, please see our sibling instance mastodon.acc.sunet.se which is open for registration to the world.

    More Info...

    WELCOME TO MASTODON@ACC!

    ACC is actively involved in several open source projects and we provide mirrors for Debian, Ubuntu, Gnome and GIMP. We also host servers for the Gimpnet, Freenode, and OFTC IRC networks.

    You can read more about our projects and our servers on the ACC website .

    Please read over our general usage policy and code of conduct. We hope you'll be happy here, but if you feel it's too strict, there are many other instances to choose from.

    General Usage

    Accounts on mastodon.acc.umu.se are for personal use only; commercial use is not allowed. If you need Mastodon for your business, why not run your own ? :)

    We ask that you comply with the rules and usage policy of the Academic Computer Club (ACC):
    ( in English ) ( i Svenska )

    You may not post (or boost/repost):

    • material illegal under Swedish laws
    • material against the rules of SUNET
    • material in breach of the copyright act
    • material that may damage ACC's public image or its relations with authorities and other institutions

    It's the final decision of ACC to judge what material may damage our public relations and take suitable action, which may include removal of the material and suspension of your account.

    Code of Conduct

    Please remember you're in a public area and what you say here may reach millions of people, many of whom have backgrounds and values that differ from yours; take a moment before posting and think about ways your message may be misunderstood.

    You may not use services hosted by ACC to violate another person's integrity. This includes compiling and posting personal information about another person, posting personal communications from a person without their permission, or sending harassing or abusive messages.

    Taking part in online interaction obliges the user to comply with the current rules and conventions for computer and net usage (see: netiquette ). On Mastodon, this includes using CW and NSFW functions and choosing an appropriate level of public display for your posts.

    If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review.

    Reporting an issue

    For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"

    For content or abuse issues:

    • if you're a user on mastodon.acc.umu.se you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you would like to report;
    • If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under "Contact".

    For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

    Privacy

    ACC will do its best to respect individual privacy, but please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.

    Staff may examine user accounts hosted on the association's equipment if they suspect activity that conflicts with the association's rules.

    Federation

    mastodon.acc.umu.se federates freely with all other Mastodon and GNU social instances in the network. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with another server will only be implemented as a last resort in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend federation with another instance, it will be noted here.

    Currently not federating with: none

    In some cases, it's necessary to "silence" another instance; this is usually due to local legal restrictions on content allowed on those instances. You will still be able to communicate with users on that instance, but their posts will not appear in the public timelines on mastodon.acc.umu.se. Please exercise discretion when boosting posts from these instances.

    Currently silenced:

    • pawoo.net (no media)

    Last updated: 2017-04-28

    Email: mastodon@acc.umu

    Admin: @maswan@mastodon.acc.umu.se

    danshudon.jp

    about

    preview

    join

    danshudon.jp

    Users: 47 . Toots: 3845 . Connections: 368 . Language: æ—¥æœ¬èª

    é€£çµ¡å…ˆ:

    empty.oh@gmail.com

    @marupun

    æ–­é…’ã®ãŸã‚ã®ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆãƒ‰ãƒ³ãƒ»ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã§ã™ã€‚æ–­é…’ãƒ»ç¦é…’ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹æ–¹ã€ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ«ä¾å­˜ç—‡ã®æ–¹ã€ã”å®¶æ—ã€ã“ã‚Œã‹ã‚‰å§‹ã‚ã¦ã¿ã‚ˆã†ã¨ã„ã†æ–¹ã‚‚ã€ã”è‡ªç”±ã«ã”å‚åŠ ãã ã•ã„ã€‚

    Admin: @marupun@danshudon.jp
